1b1: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya br-idz+nyo pA ra ma~M hA saSh+tsa ya rA thA/ bdad du/ 'phags pashes
1b2: pha rol du phyin pa sdud po tshigs su bcad pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas yang bcom ldan
1b3: ' das kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa'i phyir yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston
1b4: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / dga' dang gus dang dad pa'i mchog ni nyer bzhag ste// sgrib pa
1b5: nyon mongs bsal nas dri ma las 'das pa/ / 'gro don mngon zhugs nges pa'i shes rab pha rol phyin// gang la dpa' rnam
1b6: spyod pa de ni mnyan par gyis/ / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chu klung ji snyed cig 'bab cing // me tog 'bras ldan sman dang nags
1b7: tshal skyed byed pa/ / madros gnas pa'i klu dbang klub dag brten gnas te// don klu yi bdag po de yi mthu pal yin/
1b8: rgyal ba'i nyan thos pa dag ji snyed chos ston dang // 'chad dang rigs bdag dang ldan par brjod pa dang // mchog

2a1: 'phags bde ba byed dang de yi 'bras thob pa/ / de dag kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthu// ci phyir zhen rgya la bas chos tshul gang bstan pa// de la mi mchog slob mar gyur pas mngon pab slabs//
2a2: shing / mngon sum byas nas bslabs pa ji bzhin ston byed de// sangs rgyas mthus byed rang gi stobs kyi mthus ma yin// gang la shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mi dmigs shing // byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs
2a3: byang chub sems mi dmigs/ / de skad thos nas rmongs pa med cing skrag med pa// byang chub sems dpa' de ni bde gshegs shes rab spyod// gzugs med tshor ba med cing 'du shes sems dpa' med// de la rnam
2a4: shes gnas ni rdul tsam yod ma yin/ / de chos kun la mi gnas gnas pa med par spyod// yongs su gzung med bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub 'thob// ji ltar kun du rgyu ba bzo sbyangs shes pa yis// dmigs
2a5: med phung po rnam par 'jig pa 'byung ba ltar/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de ltar chos shes pa// mya ngan 'das la myir ga de ni shes rab gnas// yang 'di shes rab 'di ni gang yin su yi yin// gang las yin zhes
2a6: chos 'di thams cad stong par rtog/ nye bar rtags nas zhum pa med cing skrag med pa// byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub nye ba yin// gal te mi shes bzhin du gzugs su 'du shes shing // tshor ba sems pa rnam shes phung por
2a7: spyod byed cing / / phrang 'di stong zhes rtog na'ang byang chub sems dpa' ni// mtshan ma la spyod su med gnas la dang ma yin// gang zhig gzugs min tshor min 'du shes sems pa min// rnam par shes la mi spyod gnas pa med par
2a8: spyod/ de ni spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs shes rab brtan// skye med blo ldan ting 'dzin zhib mchog la rig/ byang chub sems gang de ltar 'dir bdag nir gnas pa// de na sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan yin// bdag ni mnyam

2b1: banag pa 'am sangs shes chos sems med/ / tsi b+har nin chos kyi nga bzhin mongs shes byer// de lta/ na dag shegs rnams kyi shes spyod// dab kyang ma byu bzhin pang bags byu // rna ga sa
2b2: dmigs par mi 'gyur te/ / 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// gang zhig yod pa ma yin de ni med ces bya// byis pa rnams kyis de brtags yod par med par byed// yod dang med pa 'di gnyis med pa'i chos yin te//
2b3: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'di shes nges par 'byung // gang 'dir phung po lnga dag sgyu ma 'drar shes shing // sgyu ma gzhan dang phung po gzhan du mi byed la// sna tshogs 'du shes bral zhing nye bar ni spyod pa// 'di ni shes rab
2b4: pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin/ / dge ba'i bshes dang ldan zhing lhag mthong ldan gyur pa// rgyal ba rnams kyi yum thos skrag par yod mi 'gyur// gang zhig sdig pa'i grogs ldan gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa// de ni snod som
2b5: btang chus reg zhig pa bzhin/ / ci phyir 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bya zhe na// chags pa gcod byed kun la chags pa zad par 'dod// rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub chags med gyur la reg/ des na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
2b6: ming thob bo/ / ci phyir 'di ni sems dpa' che zhes bya zhe na// sems can tshogs rnams mang po'i mchog tu gyur pa dang // sems can khams kyi lha rnams chen po gcod pa ste// de phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes ni rab brjod
2b7: ro/ / gtang ba che dang tho che ba dang mthu che dang // rgyal ba rnams kyi theg chen mchog la zhugs pa dang // go cha chen po dgos shing bdud kyi sgyu 'dul ba// de yi phyir na sems dpa' che zhes rab tu brjod// dper na sku ma
2b8: mkhan gyis bzhi mdor sprul byas te/ / skye bo phal chen mgo mang bye ba gcod byed pa'i// bsod bya de dag ci 'dra de ltar byang chub sems// 'gro kun sprul 'dra rab shes de la 'jigs pa med// gzugs dang 'du shes tsher

3a1: ba dang ni sems dpa' dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol yod pa min// de ltar byang chub la 'jug zhum pa'i sems med pa// 'di ni gang zag dam pa rnams kyi go cha mchog/ ci byer
3a2: 'di ni byang chub theg chen bya zhe na/ / de gang zhon nas sems can thams cad mya ngan zlo// theg pa 'di ni mkha' 'dra ga zhal med khang chen te// dga' skyid bde ba mngon par 'thob byed theg pa'i mchog/ gang zhig
3a3: zhon nas phyogs su 'gro ba dmigs su med/ / mya ngan 'das par 'gro bar gsungs pa 'gro mi dmigs/ dper na mi shi de yis 'gro rgyu med pa bzhin// rgyu des des ni mya ngan 'das zhes rab tu brjod// byang chub sems
3a4: dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs dus gsum dag pa ste// gang dag de ni 'dus ma byas yin spros med de// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas
3a5: rig gang gi dus kyi tshe/ / skye med rnam par bsams te 'di ltar spyod byed cing // snying rje chen po bskyed kyang sems can 'dra shes myed// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// gal te sems can 'du shes
3a6: sdug bsngal 'dra shes spyod/ / 'gro ba rnams kyi don pa sdug bsngal spang snyam ste// bdag dang sems can yongs tog byang chub sems dpa' ste// 'di ni shes rab par ma sbyin mchog spyod ma yin// bdag ni 'du
3a7: de 'drar sems can thams cad shes/ / sems can thams cad ci 'drar de 'drar chos kun shes// skye ba med dang skye ba gnyis gang mi rtog pa/ 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// 'jig rten dgan chom min
3a8: ji snyeng gongs brjod pa/ / kun la skye ba dang ni yang dag 'das spangs nas// ye shes 'chi med dam pa de las gzhan med thog// dpyir 'di ni shes rab pa rol phyin ces bya// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig dogs

3b1: med de ltar spyod/ / shes rab ldan te mnyam nyid gnas par shes par bya// chos rnams rang bzhin med par yongs su shes gyur pa// 'di ni shes rab pha rol byin mchog spyod pa yin// gang zhig gzugs la mi gnas
3b2: tshor la mi gnas shing / / gang zhig 'du shes mi gnas sems par mi gnas la// rnam shes gang mi gnas pa chos nyid gnas pa ste// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// rtag dang mi rtag
3b3: bde dang sdug bsngal sdug mi sdug/ bdag dang bdag med de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin stong // 'bras bu thob dang dgra bcom ma la mi gnas shing // dang rgyal sa dang de bzhin sangs rgyas sar mi gnas/ ji ltar 'dren pa 'dus mi byas khams mi gnas shing de bzhin /
3b4: 'dus byas la yang mi gnas gnas med spyod// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gnas la gnas med gnas// gnas med gnas yin de ni rgyal bas gnas par gsungs// gang dag bde gshegs nyan thos
3b5: 'gyur bar bya snyam dang / / rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin chos rgyal 'gyur 'dod pa// bzod pa 'di la mi rten thob par mi nus te// dper na tshu ma mo po tshogs mi mthong bzhin// chos 'chad pa dang nyan dang
3b6: bshad bya gang yin dang / / 'bras bu thob dang rkyen rgyal de bzhin 'jig rten mgon// mkhas pa gsal bas thob pa'i mya ngan 'das gang yin// de kun sgyu ma lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas bstan// gang zag bzhi
3b7: po 'di dag de la mi skrag ste/ / rgyal sras bden la mkhas dang phyir mi ldog pa dang // dgra bcom drim bsal zhing som nyi spangs pa dang // bzhi pa dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs su zin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas
3b8: rig de ltar spyod pa ni/ / dgra bcoms la mi slob rkyen togs sa la min// thams cad mkhyen nyid ched du sangs rgyas chos rjes slob// gang zhig sloba'i slob la mi slob de slob yin// gzugs 'phel yongs su nyams dang

4a1: yongs su gzung phyir min/ / chos rnams sna tshogs yongs su gzung phyir mi slob par// slob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs 'dzin la// des 'byung gang yin 'di ni yon tan dga'
4a2: ba'i slob/ gzugs ni shes rab ma yin gzugs la shes rab med// rnam shes 'du shes tshor dang sems pa 'di dag ni// shes rab ma yin 'di dag la yang shes rab med// 'di ni nam mkha'i khams
4a3: dang mtshungs te tha dad med/ / dmigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin de ni pha 'tha' med// sems can rang bzhin gang yin de yang pha 'tha' med// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin de yang pha mtha' med// 'jig rten
4a4: mkhyen pa'i shes rab de yang ba mtha' med/ / 'du shes tshu rol yin zhes 'dren pas yongs su bsgrags// 'du shes rnam par bshig nas spong ba pha rol 'gro// gang dag 'du shes bral ba 'di ni rjes
4a5: thob pa/ de dag pha rol phyin gnas ston pa'i bka' la gnas// gal te ston pas kyang ni gang ga'i bye snyed kyi// bskal par bzhugs te sems can zhes sgra yongs bsgrags kyang // bzod nas dag pas
4a6: sems can skye ba dag la 'gyur/ / 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// gang tshed ni pha rol phyin pa mchog 'di dang // 'thun par smra gyur de tshe sngon gyi skyes mchog gis// ma 'ongs pa
4a7: dus na sangs rgyas 'gyur ro zhes/ / nga lung bstan par gyur ces rgyal ba de skad gsung // shes rab pha rol phyin pa gang la mgon spyod pa// 'di ni gang zhig gus byas 'dzin dang chub byed pa// de la dug dang mtshon dang
4a8: me dang chus mi tshugs/ / bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyis glags kyang snyed mi 'gyur// la las bde gshegs yongs su mya ngan 'das pa yi// mchod rten rin chen bdun las byas shing mchod byed la/ bde bar

4b1: gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag gang 'ga'i/ / bye ma snyed kyis bye ba phrag stong zhing bkang ste// yongs su brtag bzung zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas na// sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad
4b2: kyis/ las gzhan mi byed par lha'i me tog spos rab dang // byug pas dus gsum bskal pa 'am de bas lhag mchod la// gang zhig gang las rnam 'dren stobs bcu 'byung 'gyur ba// bde bar gshegs kyi
4b3: yum 'di glegs bam la bris te/ / 'chang zhing me tog byug pas ste stang byed gyur na// mchod rten byas mchod bsod nams des ni char mi phod// rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di rigs sngags che//
4b4: sems can khams mang mya ngan sdug bsngal chos zhi byed// gang dag 'das dang gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon// rig sngags 'di bskabs sman pa'i rgyal po bla med gyur// gang dag pa na dang snying rjer
4b5: bcas pa spyad spyod pa/ / rig sngags 'di la bslabs nas mkhas pa byang chub reg/ 'dus byas bde dang 'dus ma byas bde gang yin pa// bde ba de kun 'di las byung bar rig par bya// sa bon btab nas sa
4b6: la gnas te 'byung 'gyur ba/ / tshogs pa snyed nas rnams mang gzugs dag rnam par skye// pha rol phyin lnga byang chub yon tan ji snyed pa// de dag kun kyang shes rab pha rol phyin las skye// 'khor los sgyur
4b7: rgyal lam gang nas ni rtag 'gro ba/ / lam de nyid nas rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kun/ gang nas rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di 'gro/
4b8: de nyid nas ni yon tan chos kun 'gro bar 'gyur// rgyal bas brgya byin dri ba yongs dris lan gsol ba// gal te gang ga'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing gyur la// de kun rgyal ba'i ring bsrel byur bur ba ltam gyur kyang /

5a1: bdag ni shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len// ci slad ces na sku gdung mi gus bdag ma lags// 'on kyang shes rab yongs su bsgos pas mchod par bgyid// dper na rgyal po rten mi rim 'gro
5a2: thob pa ltar/ / sangs rgyas ring bsrel shes rab pha rol phyin la rten// nor bu rin chen yon tan kun ldan rin thang myed// gab tshe gang du brtsal ba de ni phyag bgyi 'os// de par gyur kyang gab tshel ni dga' bgyid de/
5a3: yon tan de dag nor bu rin chen de'i lags// de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin mchog yon tan gyis// rgyal ba mya ngan 'das kyang ring bsrel mchod pa rnyed// de ltas gang zhig rgyal ba'i yon tan 'dzin 'tshal des// shes
5a4: rab pha rol phyin blang 'di ni thar pa lags/ / sbyin pa sbyin pa'i mngon du 'gro ba shes rab ste// tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan de bzhin no// dge chos chud mi zin phyir yongs su 'dzin pa yin/
5a5: 'di ni chos rnams thams cad tshul ci ston par byed/ dper na 'dzam bu gling na shing rnams bye ba stong // rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma gzugs mang ba// grib mar gyur pa'i grangs su brjod pa ma gtogs par/
5a6: grib ma sna tshogs med cing bye brag yod ma yin// de bzhin rgyal ba'i pha rol phyin lnga 'di dag kyang // shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mang nyid thob par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir yongs su bsngos byas na//
5a7: byang chub ces byar drug po 'di kun ro gcig 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gal te rab tu mi shes bzhin// gzugs dang 'du shes tshor dang sems pa rnam par shes// mi rtag yongs su ston pa chos la spyod
5a8: pa ste/ / mkhas pa rnam yang chos rnams 'jig par mi byed do// gang la gzugs min tshor min 'du shes mi dmigs shing // rnam par shes pa ma yin sems pa mi dmigs la// chos kun skye myed

5b1: stong pa'i tshul du rab shes pa/ / 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// la las gang ga'i klung gi bye snyed zhing rnams na// sems can ji snyed 'khod kun dgra bcom nyid btul bas/
5b2: gang gis shes rab pha rol byin 'di yag bris te// sems can mchog la glegs byin bsod nams khyad par 'phags// ci phyir zhe na sgra mchog de dag 'dir brlabs nas// chos rnams mtha
5b3: dag stong pa nyid du 'dir ston byed/ / de thos nyan thos myur du rnam par grol la reg/ rang rgyal byang chub dang ni sangs rgyas byang chub reg/ myu gu med par 'jig rten sdong 'byung yod med na/
5b4: de la yal mdab me tog 'bras bu ga la 'byung // byang chub sems med rgyal 'byung 'jig rten yod med na/ 'bras bu brgya byin tshangs pa nyan thos ga la 'byung // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang tshe 'od
5b5: kyi dra ba 'gyed/ / de tshe sems can las byed brtson pa de bzhin du// mkhas pa shes phyir 'jig rten byang chub sems byung na// ye shes kyis ni sems can yon tan chos dang ldan// dper na
5b6: ma dros mtshol klu bdag med gyur na/ / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chu klung 'bab par ga la 'gyur// chu klung med na me tog 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur// rgya mtsho la yang rin chen gzugs mang
5b7: med par 'gyur/ / de bzhin 'dir yang byang chub sems med bde gshegs kyi/ ye shes 'jig rten 'di dag kun du ga la 'byung // ye shes med na yon tan 'phel med byang chub med//
5b8: rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas chos kyang med par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di na sdang byed srog chags ji snyed pa// kun gyis snang bar bya phyir 'od rnams 'byung ba pas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od

6a1: zer gcig phyung ches mchog ste/ / sdang byed tshogs kyi 'od rnams kun gyis char mi phod// nyan thos tshogs rnams ji snyed sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // bsgom dang rab tu ldan pa'i bsod nams
6a2: tshogs bskyed pa'ang / / byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yid rang sems gcig la// nyan thos tshogs kyi bsod nams phung pos cher mi phod// 'das dus sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang
6a3: shing mang mtha' yas bye stong dag na gang bzhugs dang / / gang yang mya ngan 'das pa 'jig rten mgon po rnams// sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir rin chen chos ston pa// dang po byang chub mchog tu
6a4: thugs bskyed bskyed pa nas/ / rnam par 'dren pa rnams kyi dam chos zad kyi dus// bde bar rgyal ba de dag bsod nams gang yin pa// pha rol byin dang ldan pa sangs rgyas chos gang dang /
6a5: gang yang sangs rgyas sras rnams dang ni nyan thos dang // slob dang mi slob dge bzag bcas zag med pa// bsdus nas byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yid rang zhing // 'gro ba'i don du byang chub phyir ni
6a6: thams cad bsngo/ / yongs bsngagal te sems su 'du shes 'byung 'gyur zhing // byang chub 'du shes yongs bsngo sems can 'du shes na// 'du shes phyir ni lha gnas sems ni gsum la chags//
6a7: dmigs pa yod pas yongs su bsngo bar chud ma yin// gal te 'di ltar chos 'di 'gags shing zad pa dang // gang du yongs su bsngo ba de yang zad pa dang // chos kyis chos la nam yang mi
6a8: bsngo shes gyur na/ / de ltar rab tu shes pas yongs su bsngos pa yin// gal te mtshan mar byed na de ni bsngo ma yin// ji ste mtshan ma med na byang chub bsngo ba yin// ji ltar dug dang 'dres

6b1: pa'i gzas bzang zab/ / dkar ba'i chos la dmigs pa'ang de 'drar rdul bas gsungs// de ltas 'di ltar yongs su bas pa bslab byaste// ji ltar rgyal ba de dag dag ba de mkhyen pa'o// rnam
6b2: pagang yin 'byung gang mtshan nyid gang yin la/ / rjes su yid rang de lta de ltar yongs su bsngo// de ltar bsod nams byang chub yongs su bsngo byed na// ngag med sangs rgyas mi stong kyal bas
6b3: gsungs pa smra/ / de ltar yongs bsngo pa' bo 'jig rten dmigs can gyi// byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed thams cad zil gyis gnon// dmus long dmigs bu med pa bye ba khrag khrig rnams/
6b4: lam yang mi shes grong khyer 'jug par ga la 'gyur// shes rab med na mig med pha rol phyin lnga 'di// dmigs bu med pas byang chub reg par nus ma yin// gang tshe shes rab kyis ni rab tu zin
6b5: gyur na/ / de tshe mig rnyed gyur cing 'di yang ming thob bo// dper na ri mo'i las ni yongs zin mig med pa// ji srid mig ma bris pas rngan pa mi thob bzhin// gang tshe 'dus byas 'dus ma byas dang
6b6: dkar nag chos/ / shes rab rnam par bshig nas rdul tsam mi dmigs tshe// 'jig rten dag na shes rab pha rol phyin grangs 'gro// nam mkha' gang la'ang cung zad mi gnas de dang 'dra// gal te bdag/
6b7: ni rgyal ba'i shes rab spyad bya zhing // sems can sdug bsngal reg pa khrag khrig mang dgrol sems// sems can 'du shes yongs rtog byang chub sems dpa' ste// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog
6b8: spyod ma yin/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sngon chad spyod pa'i tshe// pha rol phyin 'dir spyod pa mkhas pa som nyi med// thos ma thag du des ni ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed// des ni byang chub zhi ba

7a1: myur du rtogs par 'gyur/ / sngon spyod chen sangs rgyas khrag khrig bkur byas kyang // rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin la ma dad na// thos nas blo chung de yis 'di ni spong byed de// spangs nas
7a2: skyabs med 'gyur ba de ni mnar med 'gro/ / de lta bas na gal te sangs rgyas ye shes mchog/ reg par 'dod na rgyal ba'i yum 'dir dad par bgyis// dper na chong pa rin chen gling du song nas
7a3: ni/ zong zad slar log lta bur gyur na mi rung ngo // gzugs kyi dag pa 'bras bu dag par rig par bya// 'bras bu gzugs dag thams cad mkhyen nyid dag par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen nyid 'bras
7a4: bu dag dang gzugs dag pa/ / nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs te dbyer med gcad du med// dpa' bo gar spyod shes rab pha rol phyin pa yis// khams gsum yang dag 'das la rnam par grol
7a5: ba'ang yin/ / nyon mongs bsal bar gyur kyang skye ba ston par byed// dang na dang 'chi ba med kyang 'chi 'pho ston// 'gro ba 'di dag ming dang gzugs kyi 'dam la chags// rlung gi 'khor lo//
7a6: lta bu'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khyam// 'gro ba 'khrul pa ri dgas rgyar chud 'drar shes nas// shes rab ldan pa mkha' la bya bzhin rnam par rgyu// spyod pa yongs dag gang zhig gzugs la mi spyod
7a7: cing / rnam shes 'du shes tshor ba sems par mi spyod na// de ltar spyod pa chags pa thams cad yongs spong zhing // chags las rnam grol bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyod// de ltar spyod pa'i
7a8: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal pa/ / tshogs pa bcad nas 'gro la chags pa med par 'gro// nyi ma sgra gcan gza' bral lha der 'dug pa dang // me btang rtswa dang shing dang / gas tshal sreg pa bzhin//

7b1: chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin dag cing yongs dag par// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin ldan// byed pa po yang mi dmigs chos kun mi dmigs te// 'din ga
7b2: rab pa rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin/ / rgyal ba la ni lA rgyal brgya byin gyis zhus pa// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa ji ltar brtson// phung po khams la rdul tsam brtson par mi byed
7b3: ci / / phung por mi brtson de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson// gang zhig chos 'di sprul dang rgyu ma 'drar thos nas// som nyi med cing slob la phyir zhing spyod byed pa// sems can de ni ring nas
7b4: theg chen zhugs rig bya/ / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig mang la lhag byas yin// dgon pa'i lam ni dpag tshad mang por zhugs pa'i mis// gnag rdzi mtshoms kyi nags tshal phun sum tshogs
7b5: mthong nas/ / 'di dag grong dang grong khyer nye ba'i rtags snyam ste// dbugs phyin rnyed par 'gyur zhing chom kun 'jigs pa med// de bzhin byang chub yongs su tshol tshe rgyal rnams kyi// shes rab
7b6: rol phyin 'di mnyan pa gang thob pa/ / de ni dbugs phyin thob par gyur cing 'jigs med de// dgra bcoms lam yin rkyen rtogs sa la min// mi zhig rgya mtsho'i chu ni blta phyir 'gro ba yis//
7b7: gal te shing dang nags tshal ri mthong da dung ring // ci ste rtags ma mthong na rgya mtsho chen po ni// nye bar gyur to snyam ste de la som nyi med// de ltar byang chub dam par rab zhugs rgyal ba yi// shes
7b8: rab pha rol phyin pa 'di mnyan rig par bya/ / rnam par 'dren pas mngon sum lung bstan ma gyur kyang // sangs rgyas byang chub ring por mi thogs bdag reg 'gyur// dpyid dus bzang la sdong po

8a1: lo ma lhags gyur na/ / yal gas ring por mi thogs lo 'bras me tog spun// shes rab pa rol byin 'di su yi lag thob pa// ring por mi thogs 'dren pa rnams kyi byang chub thob// dper na bung
8a2: med sbrum gang sdug bsngal nyen gyur na/ / de ni de yi btsa' ba'i dus la bab ces bya// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i shes rab nyan// dga' dang 'dun pa skyed pa myur du byang chub reg
8a3: shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod tshe rnal 'byor pa/ / gzugs kyi 'phel ba dang ni yongs su 'grib mi mthong // gang zhig chos dang chos min chos dbyings mi mthong zhing // mya ngan 'das la mi reg de ni
8a4: shes rab gnas/ / gang zhig 'dir spyod sangs rgyas chos rnams mi rtog te// stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa byang chub zhi mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog rtog bral byin gyi rlabs kyis spyod// 'di ni shes rab pa
8a5: rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin/ / smra ba'i zla ba sangs rgyas la ni rab 'byor zhus// yon tan dga' ba rnams kyi bar du gcod gang lags// ston pas bka' stsal bar du gcod par 'gyur mad
8a6: ste/ / de las re shig nang zad tsam zhig yongs su brjod// rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di yi ga 'bri tshe// spobs pa tha dad rnam pa du ma 'byung 'gyur zhing // 'gro ba'i don ma byas par klog bzhin
8a7: myur du yang / / yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba 'di ni bdud kyi las// 'di bshad tshen kha cig som nyi za 'gyur te/ 'dren pas 'dir ni bdag gi ming yang yongs ma brjod// rigs dang sa dang
8a8: rus kyang yongs su ma brjod ces/ / 'di ni nyan par mi 'gyur spong 'brur bdud kyi las// de ltar mi shes de dag rtsal bor nas ni// rmongs pas yal gdag dang mdab ma tshol bar 'gyur/

8b1: glang po rnyed nas glang po'i rjes ni tshol ba ltar// shes rab pha rol phyin thos mdo tshol de bzhin no// dper na la las ro brgya ldan pa'i zas rnyed la// zas mchog rnyed nas zas ngan tshol bar byed pa
8b2: lhur/ / byang chub sems dpa' pha rol phyin pa 'di rnyed nas// dgra bcom sa yis byang chub tshol byed de bzhin no// sti stang 'dod par 'gyur zhing rnyed pa 'dod gyur dang // lha dang bcas pa'i sems
8b3: kyes khyim 'dres byed ldan zhing / / chos btang nas ni chos min bya ba spyod 'gyur ba// lam bor la mgol 'gro ba 'di ni bdud kyi las// gang dag de yi tshe na 'dun cing dang gyur nas// chos kyi
8b4: dam pa 'di ni nyan du song ba las/ / de dag gis ni chos smra bya ba ldan rig nas// dga' ba med cing yid mi bde bar gyur nas 'gro// de yi tshe na bdud kyi las 'di 'byung bar 'gyur// de tshe gang dag
8b5: gis ni dge slong mang dkrugs nas/ / shes rab pha rol phyin 'di 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i// bar du gcod pa rnam mang gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur// rin chen rin thang med pa rnyed 'gyur gang dag yin//
8b6: de dag dkon la dus rnams rtag tu 'tshe ba'ang mang // de bzhin rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog/ rin chen tshes kyang dkon la rtag tu 'tshe ba'ang mang // theg pa gsar du zhugs pa'i sems
8b7: can blo chung ba/ / gang zhig dkon pa'i rin chen 'di ni mi rnyed pa// de la bar chad bya phyir bdud ni spro bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag yongs su 'dzin la sbyor// ma zhig na bar gyur la bu ni
8b8: mang yod pa/ / de kun yid mi bde zhing de la rim gro byed// de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas kyang // yum gyur shes rab dam pa 'di la dgongs pa mdzad// gang dag 'das dang phyogs/

9a1: bcu'i 'jig rten mgon gang dang // ma 'das dus na 'byung 'gyur de dag 'di las 'byung // 'dzag rten snyan brgyal ba rnams kyi skyed byed yum// sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi spyad bsngon
9a2: par byed/ / 'jig rten de bzhin nyid dang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid// rang rgyal de bzhin nyid dang rgyal sras de bzhin nyid// gcig pa nyid de dngos bral gzhan mnad bzhin nyid// shes rab pha rol phyin pa de
9a3: bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen/ / mkhas pa 'jig rten gnas sam mya ngan 'das kyang rung // chos nyid sgron med chos rnams stong pa 'di gnas te// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin nyid 'di rjes su rtogs//
9a4: de phyir de bzhin gshegs zhes sangs rgyas mtshan gsol to// shes rab pha rol phyin pa dga' tshal la rten pa// stobs bcu rnam 'dren rnams kyi spyod yul 'di yin te// sems can sdug bsngal ngan song //
9a5: gsum las yongs 'don kyang // de dag nam yang sems can 'du shes 'gyur ba med// dper na seng ge'i ri sul rten nas 'jigs med par// ri dgas phra mo mang skrag byed cing sgra sgrogs ltar// mi yi ser
9a6: ge shes rab pha rol phyin brten nas/ / mu stegs can mang skrag byed 'jig rten sgra yang sgrogs// dper na nam mkhar gnas pa'i nyi ma'i 'od zer ni// sa 'di skems par byed cing gzugs kyang rab tu ston//
9a7: de bzhin chos rgyal shes rab pha rol phyin rten pa// sred pa'i chu klung skems shing chos kyang rab tu ston// gzugs rnams mi mthong tshor ba dag kyang mi mthong zhing // 'du shes mthong ba med la sems pa
9a8: mi mthong zhing / / gang la rnam par shes dang sems yid mthong med pa// 'di ni chos mthong yin zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bstan// nam mkha' mthong zhes sems can tshig tu rab brjod pa//

9b1: nam mkha' ji ltar mthong ste don 'di brtag par bgyi// de ltar chos mthong ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan// mthong ba dpe gzhan gyis ni bsnyad par nus ma yin// gang gis de ltar mthong ba
9b2: de yis chos kun mthong / rgyal po btang snyoms 'dug cing blon po kun byed ltar// sangs rgyas mdzad dang nyan thos chos rnams ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad shes rab pha rol phyin pa byed// rgyal po
9b3: grong du mi 'gro yul 'khor mi 'gro la/ / rang gi yul nas 'du ba thams cad sdud pa ltar// byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid gang du'ang mi 'gro la// sangs rgyas sa yi yon tan gang yin thams cad
9b4: sdud/ / gang la bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' dang brtan yod// shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog la bsam sbyor ba// nyan thos rang rgyal sa gnyis shin du 'das byas nas// zil gyis mi gnon
9b5: rgyal ba'i byang chub myur du thob/ / dper na rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i gru ni chag gyur la// mi gang ro'am rtswa'am shing ni mi 'dzin pa// chu dbus 'jig par 'gyur te ngogs su phyin mi 'gyur// gang zhig
9b6: 'dzin pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur/ / de ltar dad ldan dad pa thob pa gang zhig ni// shes rab pha rol phyin yum rjes su mi 'jug min// de dag thabs kyi yon tan shes rab yongs zin na//
9b7: mchog tu zad byung ba de gshegs byang chub myur du reg/ dper na la las rdza so ma btang chub skyed na// nyam chung byer ni myur du 'jig par rig par bya// so btang bum par chu skyed lam du 'jig pa yi//
9b8: 'jigs pa med cing bde bar khyim du phyin par 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mer gyur kyang // shes rab rnam par nyams na myur du ma rung 'gyur// dad pas shes rab kyis ni yongs su

10a1: zin muran/ / sa gnyis shin tu 'das te byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// dper na bcos legs ma byas gru ni rgya mtsho'i nang // nor dang bcas shing tshong par bcas te 'jig par 'gyur// gud legs par
10a2: bcos legs byas dang ldan gyur na/ / mi 'jig nor dang bcas par ngogs su phyin par 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dad pas yongs bsgos kyang // shes rab med na byang chub las ni myur nyams
10a3: 'gyur/ / de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog ldan na// ma smas ma nyams rgyal ba'i byang chub reg par 'gyur// lo brgya nyi shu lon te rgas shing sdug bsngal mi// langs kyang bdag nyid 'gro bar nus pas
10a4: yin te/ / de ni g.yas g.yon gnyis nas mi yis rten byas na// 'gyel ba'i 'jigs pa med cing bde blag 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab stobs chung ba// rab tu zhugs par gyur
10a5: kyang rab tu nyams par 'gyur/ / de nyid thabs dang shes rab mchog gis yongs zin na// me nyams de bzhin gshegs kyi byang chub reg par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' dang po'i las kyi sar gnas gang //
10a6: lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs pa// slob ma bzang po bla ma gus ldan de dag gis// bla ma mkhas pa rnams la rtag dra brten par bya// ci phyir zhe na mkhas pa'i yon tan de las
10a7: 'byung / / de dag shes rab pha rol phyin pa rjes su ston// sangs rgyas chos rnams dge ba'i bshes la rten to zhes// yon tan kun gyi mchog mnga' rgyal ba de skad gsung // sbyin dang tshul khrims
10a8: bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang / / bsam gtan shes rab byang chub yongs su bsngo bar gyis// byang chub phung por zhen nas mchog 'dzin ma byed ces// dang po'i las can de la de skad bstan

10b1: bar bya/ / de ltar spyod pa legs mtsho smra ba'i zla ba rnams// 'gro ba'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang ni gnas yin te// rten dang blo dang gling dang yongs 'dren don 'dod pa/ gsal byed sgron ma chos mchog
10b2: smra ba mi 'khrugs yin/ / grags chen ldan rnams bya dka' go cha gyon byed de// phung po khams dang skyed mched rnams kyi go cha min// theg gsum 'du shes bral zhing yongs su bzung ba med//
10b3: mi ldog g.yo ba med cing mi 'khrugs chos can yin// de dag 'di 'dra'i chos dang ldan zhing spros pa med// the tshom som nyi yid gnyis bral zhing don dang ldan// shes rab pha rol phyin pa thob nas
10b4: mi nur ga/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing mi ldog rig par bya// 'dren pa rnams kyi chos 'di zab ste mthong bar dka'// sus kyang rtogs pa med cing thob par 'gyur med pa// de phyir pan mdzad
10b5: brtser ldan byang chub brnyes nas ni/ / sems can tshogs sus shes snyam thugs khral chung bar mdzad// sems can rnams ni gnas la dga' zhing yul rnams 'dod// 'dzin la gnas
10b6: shing mi mkhas blun rmongs mun pa bzhin/ / thob par bya ba'i chos ni gnas med 'dzin med de// des na 'jig rten dag dang rtsod pa 'byung ba yin// nam mkha'i khams ni shar gyi phyogs dang lho
10b7: phyogs dang / / de bzhin nub kyi phyogs dang byang phyogs pa mtha' yas// steng dang 'og dang phyogs bcu'i ji snyed rnams na'ang yod// tha dad gyur pa med cing bye brag gyur pa med// 'das pa'i
10b8: de bzhin nyid gang ma byon de bzhin nyid/ / da ltar de bzhin nyid gang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid// chos kun de bzhin nyid gang rgyal ba'i de bzhin nyid// chos kyi de bzhin nyid 'di thams cad bye brag med// /

11a1: bde gshegs byang chub tha dad chos dang bral gyur pa// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig thob 'dod pa// thabs dang ldan pas shes rab pha rol phyin la sbyor// 'dren pa'i shes
11a2: rab med na thob par 'gyur ma yin/ / bya zhig lus che dpag tshad brgya rtsa lnga bcu par// gyur la 'dab gshog zad de nyam rtsal yod min na// de yis sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'dzam gling 'dir//
11a3: bdag nyid mchongs na der ni nyam nyes gyur ba yin// rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol phyin pa lnga 'di yang // skal ba bye ba khrag khrig mang por sgrub byas shing // smon lam mtha' yas rgya chen 'jig rten
11a4: rtag bsten kyang / / thabs med shes rab bral ba nyan thos nyid du lhung // sangs rgyas theg pa 'di la nges par 'byung 'dod gang // 'gro ba kun la sems snyoms pha ma'i 'du shes dang // pham pa'i sems
11a5: dang byams pa'i yid kyis b.rul bya zhing / / thab med cing drang la tshig 'jam smra bar bya// 'jig rten mgon la gnas brtan rab 'byor yongs zhus pa// yon tan rgya mtsho'i nyon mongs ma
11a6: mchis rtags bstan gsol/ / mthu che bdag ji ltar slar ldog mi 'gyur ba// de ltar yon tan phyogs tsam rgyal bas lung bstan gsol// tha dad 'du shes bral zhing rigs pa ldan tshig smra//
11a7: dge sbyong dag dang bram ze gzhan la rten mi byed// mkhas pas dus rnams rtag tu ngan song gsum po spangs// de dag dge bcu'i las kyi lam la mngon par brtson// zang zing med par 'gro la chos
11a8: ni rjes su ston/ / chos la gcig tu dga' zhing rtag tu tshig 'jam ldan// 'gro 'chag nyal dang 'dug par shes bzhin rab tu ldan// gnyal zhing gang tsam lta zhing 'gro la sems 'khru la med//

11b1: gtsang byas gtsang ma'i gos 'chang gsum po dben zhing dag/ rnyed 'dod ma yin khyu mchog rtag tu chos 'dod pa// bdud kyi yul las 'das shing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/ bsam gtan bzhi la bsam byed
11b2: bsam gtan deng mi gnas/ / grags pa 'dod pa ma yin khro bas sems dkris med// khyim par gyur kyang rtag tu dngos po kun ma chags// 'tsho ba'i phyir ni yangs longs spyod tshol mi byed// drag shul spyod
11b3: sngags mi byed bud med sbyor sngags min/ / 'dod pa'i las can pho mor 'gyur zhes ston mi byed// rab tu dben pa'i shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson// 'thab dang rtsod dang bral zhing byams pa'i
11b4: sems kyang bstan/ / kun mkhyen 'dod cing brtan la rtag tu gzhol sems ldan// mtha' 'khob kla klo'i skye bo'i yul mtha' rnam par spangs// rang gi sa la dogs med rtag tu ri rab 'dra// chos
11b5: phyir srog kyang 'dor zhing rnal 'byor rab tu brtson/ / mi ldog rtags ni 'di dag yin par shes par bya// gzugs dang tshor dang 'du shes sems pa rnam shes rnams// zab ste rang bzhin mtshan ma
11b6: med cing rab zhi pa/ / dper na mda' yis rgya mtsho'i gting thug tshol ba ltar// shes rab kyis ni brtags na phung po'i gting mi rnyed// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de ltar zab gyur cing // theg
11b7: pa don dam chags med gang la phung po dang / / khams dang skye mched yod min chos 'di rtogs pa de'i// bsod nams yang dag grub pa de las ci zhig yod// dper na 'dod chags chos la spyod pa'i
11b8: skyes bu zhig/ bud med dus btab de dang ma phrad de yi ni// nyin cig sems kyi rnam rtog spyod pa ji snyed pa// de snyed bskal pa'i byang chub sems dpas thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'

12a1: gang zhig bskal ma dbye stong du/ / dgra bcom rang rgyal sbyin byed tshul khrims srung byed kyang // gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog ldan pa'i chos// brjod pa'i legs la sbyin dang tshul
12a2: khrims char mi phod/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab mchog bsgoms te// de las langs nas gos pa med pa'i chos brjod cing // de yang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub rgyur bsngo na/
12a3: dge ba de dang mnyam pa 'jig rten gsum na med// bsod nams de yang gsog dang de bzhin stong pa dang // gsob dang ya ma brla dang snying po med par shes// de ltar bde gshegs rnams
12a4: kyi shes rab spyad spyod na/ / spyod tshe bsod nams dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin// sangs rgyas kyis bshad rab tu sbyar cing rab bstan pa'i// chos 'di thams cad brjod pa tsam du zad shes na/
12a5: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por brjod byas kyang // chos kyi dbyings la zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol phyin ces bya ba gang // chos de rnams kyang ming tsam du ni
12a6: yongs su bsgrags/ / yongs bsngo rlom sems med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// nyams pa med cing sangs rgyas byang chub mchog reg 'gyur// 'bru mar snying po 'bar ba phrad pa dang po yis//
12a7: snying po tshig min de med par yang de mi tshig/ me lce phrad pa thams snying po tshig min la// me lde tha ma med par snying po tshig min ltar// dang po'i sems kyis byang chub mchog reg ma yin la// de med par
12a8: yang de la reg par nus ma yin/ / tha ma'i sems kyis byang chub zhi pa thob min la// de med par yang de thob nus pa ma yin no// sa bon las ni myu gu me tog 'bras bu 'byung // de yang 'gags la shing

12b1: yang med pa der smin ltar/ / de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub rgyu yin te// de yang 'gags la byang chub med pa de ma yin// chu yi thigs pas bum pa dang po tha ma'i bar// rim gyis nyung ngu nyud
12b2: dus de yongs 'gengs pa ltar/ / de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub mchog rgyu ste// rim gyis dkar po'i yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// stong pa mtshan med smon pa med pa'i chos
12b3: spyod cing / / mya ngan 'das la mi reg mtshan mar mi spyod pa// dper na gnyan pa mkhas pa par 'gro chur 'gro yang // mtha' gnyis mi gnas rgya mtshar gnas pa med pa bzhin// de ltar spyod pa'i/
12b4: byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam bdag/ stobs bcus lung bstan byang chub reg 'gyur rlom sems med// 'di la ci yang med ces byang chub skrag pa med// de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes
12b5: rab spyod pa yin/ / 'jig rten mgon pa'i lam dang mu ge nad bcas par// mthong nas skrag pa med cing de nas go gyon te// phyi ma'i mu mthar rtag tu brtson zhing rab shes nas// yongs su skyo ba'i
12b6: yid ni rdul tsam skye mi byed/ / byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i shes rab spyod byed cing // phung po 'di dag gdod nas stong zhing skye med shes// mnyam par ma bzhag sems can khams la snying
12b7: rje 'jug/ bar skabs der yang sangs rgyas chos las yongs mi nyams// dper na skyes bu mkhas pa yon tan kun ldan zhing // stobs ldan mi thub brtson byas sgyu brtsal cho ga shes//
12b8: 'phod dang bzo gnas mang po'i pha rol phyin gyur cing // sgyu ma sgrub shes 'gro don rab tu 'dod pa zhig/ pha dang ma dang chung mar bcas par yongs bsdus nas// dgra byed mang po dgon pa'i

13a1: lam du phyin pa dang / / de yis dpa' zhing rtul phong skyes bu mang sprul te// bde bar song zhing phyir yang khyim du 'ong ba ltar// de bzhin de tshe byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yang /
13a2: sems can khams rnams kun du snying rje cher bskyed cing // bdud bzhi dag dang sa gnyis las kyang rab 'das nas// ting 'dzin mchog la gnas shing byang chub reg mi byed// mkha' la rlung rten de la
13a3: chu'i phung po rten/ / de la sa chen 'di rten de la 'gro ba rten// sems can las la spyod pa'i rgyu ni de 'dra ste// nam mkha' gang la gnas yin don 'di bsam par gyis// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'
13a4: stong pa nyid gnas pa/ / 'gro la sems can shes pa'i smon lam rten can gyis// bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs du ma ston byed cing // mya ngan 'das la mi reg stong par gnas pa med// gang gi tshe na byang
13a5: chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba/ / stong pazhi pa'i ting 'dzin dam pa 'di spyod pa// bar skabs der ni mtshan ma rab tu bsgom mi byed// mtshan ma med par gnas shing zhi la rab zhi spyod// bar//
13a6: snang 'phur ba'i bya la gnas yod ma yin te// de na gnas pa ma yin sa la ltung mi 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar sgor spyod pa// mya ngan 'das la mi reg mtshan mar spyod ma
13a7: yin/ / dper na 'phong bslabs skyes bus gnam du mda' 'phangs te// mda' gzhan dag gis phyi bzhin brgyud dmar long btags te// snga ma'i mda' des la ltung ba'i skabs mi byed// mi de
13a8: 'dod na mda' des la ltung bar 'gyur/ / de ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog spyod pa// shes rab thabs stobs rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rnam spyod pa// de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba ji srid ma rdzogs pa// de

13b1: srid stong nyid dam pa de ni thob mi byed/ / dper na dge slong rdzu 'phrul stobs mchog ldan pa zhig/ nam mkhar gnas te cig char cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul// 'gro dang 'chag pa dang ni nyal dang 'dug
13b2: pab ston/ / de ni skyo ba med cing de la dub pa med// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa stong gnas shing // ye shes rdzu 'phrul pha rol son la gnas pa med// 'gro ba dag la bya ba rnam pa
13b3: mtha' yas ston/ / bskal pa bye bar skyo ba med cing dub pa med// dper na mi 'ga' g.yang sa chen por 'dug byed cing // lag pa gnyi gas gdugs gnyis 'dzin cing nam mkha' la// 'tshod
13b4: par byed cing g.yang sa chen por lus bor nas/ / ltung bar mi 'gyur ji srid der ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa snying rjer gnas// thabs dang shes rab
13b5: gnyis kyi gdugs ni yongs bzung ste/ / chos rnams stong pa mtshan med smon pa med rtog cing // mya ngan 'das la reg pa med la chos kyang mthong // dper na rin chen 'dod pa rin chen//
13b6: gling song ste// rin chen rnyed nas phyir yang khyim du 'ong 'gyur ba// der ni ded dpon 'ba' zhig bde bar 'tsho byed cing // gnyen bshes tshogs yid mi bder 'jog pa min pa ltar//
13b7: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' stong nyid rin chen gyi// gling du song ste bsam gtan dbang po stobs thob pa// mya ngan 'das la reg pa 'ba' shig mngon dga' zhing // sems
13b8: can sdug bsngal yid du 'jog par 'gyur ma yin/ / dper na don gnyer tshong pa rgyus shes bya ba'i phyir// bar gyi grong khyer grong brdal grong gang yin par 'gro// der yang mi gnas rin

14a1: chen gling du'ang mi gnas la/ / rig pa khyim du mi gan sa la ma la mkhas par 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' gal te nyan thos dang // rang rgyal rnams kyi shes pa rnam
14a2: 'gro la kun la mkhas/ / de la mi reg sangs rgyas ye shes gnas ma yin// 'dus ma byas la mi gnas lam gyi tshul shes yin// gang tshe 'gro la byams pas rjes su 'brel byas
14a3: nas/ / ting 'dzin stong pa mtshan med smon pa med spyod pa// de ni mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur zhe'am// 'dus byas yin par gdags nus de ni gnas med do// dper na sprul
14a4: pa'i mi lus mi snang ma yin zhing / / de ni ming gis kyang ni gdags par nus pa ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' na ma thar sgor spyod pa// de ni ming gis kyang ni gdags par nus pa yin/
14a5: gal te spyod pa dang ni dbang po yongs dris la// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i chos// yongs su mi ston phyir mi ldog pa sa yi chos// mi 'chad de ni lung ma bstan par
14a6: rig par bya/ / dgra bcoms dang rkyen gyis sangs rgyas ye shes dang // khams gsum dag la rmi lam na yang mi 'dod cing // sangs rgyas rnams mthong 'gro la chos kyang ston byed pa//
14a7: de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// rmi lam na ni sems can ngan song gsum gnas mthong // skad cig de la ngan song rgyun bcad smon lam 'debs// bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs
14a8: kyis me yi phung po zhi/ / de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// mi yi 'jig rten 'byung po'i gdon dang nad mang ba// phan dang snying rtser ldan pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis zhi// 'on kyang

14b1: rlom sems med cing nga rgyal skye med pa/ / de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// ci ste de ni bden pa'i byin rlabs sna tshogs dag/ 'byor pas bdag lung bstan snyam rlom sems
14b2: 'byung ba'am/ / gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis lung bstan rlom// rlom sems gnas pa de ni bla chung shes par bya// ming gi gzhi las bdud ni nye bar 'ongs gyur nas/
14b3: 'di skad smras te 'di ni khyod dang pha ma dang // khyod kyi bdun mes rgyud kyi bar gyi ming yin zhing // gang tshe khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i ming 'di yin// sbyangs sdom rnal 'byor ldan pa
14b4: ci 'dra 'byung 'gyur la/ / khyod sngon yon tan tshul yang 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod do// de skad gang thos rlom sems byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongs su bslang zhing blo chung rig
14b5: par bya/ / rab tu dben pa'i grong dang grong khyer ri sul dang // dgon pa dben pa nags khrod rab tu sten byed cing // bdag bstong gzhan la smod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis
14b6: yongs su bslang zhing blo chung rig par bya/ / rtag tu grong dang yul 'khor grong rdal gnas byed cing // sems can smin byed byang chub brtson pa ma gtogs par// de ni dgra bcom rang rgyal
14b7: 'dod pa gzhan mi skye/ / 'di ni bde bar gshegs kyi sras kyis dben par gsungs// gang zhig dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa'i ri yi sul// sbrul gyis gang bar lo mang dbye bar gnas
14b8: byed kyang / / dben pa 'di mi shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de// lhag pa'i nga rgyal rnyed nas 'dre bar gnas pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i don brtson bsam gtan dang //

15a1: skyobs dang dbang po rnam thar ting 'di thob da la// 'di ni dgon dben spyod pa min snyam brnyes byed pa// de na bdud kyi spyong yal gnas shes rgyal bas gsungs// ga shig
15a2: dam 'on te dgon par gnas kyang rung / / theg pa gnyis kyi sems bral byang chub mchog des na// 'di ni 'gro don bzhugs pa rnams kyis dben pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' drod nyom de ni
15a3: bdag nyid nyams/ / de lta bas na byang chub dam pa tshol ba yis// bsam pa drag ldan mkhas pas nga rgyal nges bcom ste// nad pa'i tshogs kyis gso phyir sman pa sten pa ltar// g.yel ba med
15a4: par dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya/ / sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs byang chub sems dpa' dag/ pha rol phyin dang bcas te dge ba'i bshes su bstan// de dag rjes su ston byed 'di/
15a5: ni bsgrub pa'i sa// rgyu rnam gnyis kyis sangs rgyas byang chub myur du rtogs// rgyal ba 'das dang ma byon phyogs bcur gang bzhugs pa// kun lam pha rol phyin pa 'di yin gzhan ma yin//
15a6: pha rol phyin 'di byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams kyi// gsal dang sgron dang snang dang ston mchog yin zhes bshad// ji ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa mtshan nyid stong // chos 'di thams cad
15a7: mtshan nyid de dang 'drar shes shing / / chos rnams stong zhing mtshan ma med par rab shes na// de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin// sems can yongs su rtog pa zas la
15a8: 'dod byed cing / / 'khor bar chags pa'i yid dang ldan rnams rtag tu 'khor// bdag dang bdag gi chos gnyis yang dag min stong ste// byis pa bdag nyid kyis ni mkha' la mdud pa bor/

15b1: dper na dogs pa'i 'du shes kyis ni drug bslang ba// drug de khong du song ba med kyang brgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin byis pa bdag dang bdag gir khas len pa// bdag der 'dra shes yang dag
15b2: mi rtag skye zhing mchi/ / ji ltar 'dzin pa de ltar kun nas nyon mongs bstan// bdag dang bdag gir mi dmigs rnam par byed par gsungs// 'di la gang yang nyon mongs rnam dag 'gyur
15b3: med par/ / byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin pa rtogs// 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can ji snyed ma lus pa// de dag thams cad byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas/
15b4: lo stong bye ba mang por smin pa byin byas la// kun kyang 'gro ba'i don du byang chub rgyur bsngo yang // gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mngon brtson pa// tha na nyi ma gcig tsog rjes su 'thun
15b5: byed na/ / de la sbyin pa'i phung pos bsod nams char mi phod// de phyir g.yel med rtag tu shes rab 'jug par bya// shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// snying rje
15b6: chen po bskyed kyang sems can 'du shes med/ / de tshe mkhas pa 'gro ba kun gyi sbyin gnas 'gyur// rtag tu yul 'khor bsod snyoms don yod yongs su spyod// byang chub sems
15b7: dpa' gang 'dir yun rings 'brel pa yi/ / lha mi ngan song gsum gyi sems can dgrol ba'i phyir// lam yangs pha rol sems can khams la ston 'dod pas// nyin mtshan shes
15b8: rab pha rol phyin la brtson par bya/ / mi zhig sngon chad ma rnyed pa yi rin chen mchog/ dus gzhan zhig na rnyed par gyur te dga' ba las// rnyed ma thag tu bag med gyur te stong na ni//

16a1: stor bas rin chen mngon 'dod rtag tu sdug bsngal lo// de ltar byang chub mchog zhugs rin chen lta bu yi// shes rab pha rol phyin la rnal 'byor dor mi bya// rin chen rnyeng nas
16a2: blangs te rab tu brtson dkris nas/ / myur du 'gro bar byed pa zhi par 'gyur ba bzhin// nyi ma sprin dang bral ba'i 'od zer dra ba can// mun nag thibs po mun pa thams cad 'joms
16a3: 'char ba/ / srin bu me khyer srog chags 'byung po thams cad dang // skar ma'i tshogs dang zla ba'i 'od kun zil gyis gnon// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol
16a4: byin/ mchog spyod stong pa dang ni mtshan ma med spyod pa// mkhas pas lta ba'i thibs po bcom nas 'gro kun dang // dgra bcom rang rgyal byang chub sems mang zil gyis gnan/
16a5: dper na rgyal po'i bu zhig nor gtod don 'dod pa// kun gyi gtso bor gyur te mngon par 'gro bya'os// 'di ni da lta na yang sems can mang dga' byed// thabs thobs gyur te rgyal
16a6: srid gnas nas smos ci dgos/ / de ltar shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang // bdud rtsi sbyin par byed cing lha dang mi rnams dga'// 'di ni da lta na yang sems
16a7: can mang phan brtson/ / chos kyi rgyal por gnas par gyur nas smos ci dgos// de yi tshe na bdud ni zug rngu ldan par 'gyur// mya ngan nyams thag sdug bsngal yid mi bde nyams
16a8: chung / / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di yid rur 'gyur nas// 'jigs pa bstan phyir phyogs rnams sreg cing skar mda' gtong // gang tshe mkhas pa de dag bsam pa drag ldan zhing /

16b1: nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog don lha// de tshe lus sems dag ni mkha' 'gro b+ha wAr d+ha// nag po'i rtsa lag rnams kyis glags rnyed ga la 'gyur// gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'thab
16b2: dang rtsod gyur cing / / phan tshun mi mthun khros pa'i sems dang ldan gyur pa// de tshe bdud ni dga' zhing mchog tu nyams bder 'gyur// de gnyis rgyal ba'i ye shes las ni ring gyur snyam// de gnyis
16b3: ring du 'gyur zhing sha za 'dra bar 'gyur/ / gnyi ga rang gi dam bcas nyams par byed par 'gyur// sdang zhing bzod dang bral la byang chub ga la yod// de tshe bdud rnams phyogs dang bcas te dga'
16b4: bar 'gyur/ / lung bstan ma thob byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis// lung bstan thob la sems khros rtsod pa rtsom byed na// tha ba skyon ldan sems kyi skad cig ji snyed pa// de snyed bskal par
16b5: gzhi nas go cha go bgos so/ / sangs rgyas bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pas byang chub reg/ sems 'di bzang ba min snyam dran pa skyed byed cing // so sor 'chags par byed cing phyis kyang sdom byed
16b6: la/ / dga' bar mi byed de ni sangs rgyas chos 'dir slob// gang zhig slob tshe bslab pa gang yang khas mi len// slob pa po dang bslab pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing // bslab dang bslab pa
16b7: ma yin 'di gnyis mi rtog pa/ / de ltar gang slob de ni sangs rgyas chos 'dir slob// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de lta'i bslab 'di shes// de ni gzhar yang bslab nyams tshul khrims
16b8: 'tshal mi 'gyur/ / de ni sangs rgyas chos mnyes bya phyir 'di la slob// de ni bslab lhag bslab la mkhas te dmigs pa med// mkhas pa 'od byed rnams kyi shes rab de ltar slob// dge ba ma yin

17a1: sems gag capa yang bcad ma byed/ / nyam ma 'a' sa 'ag ba bar byas pa la gnan pa'i// mdun rtsa bar ldang la na ldan pa ma gnas pazhin// gas rab par sa byed pa bslab bzlas rnam pa ca//
17a2: pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par 'gyur// 'jig tshogs lta bar sa/ ba drug bcu gnyis 'dus ltar// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa 'di dag 'dus par gsungs// dper na srog gi dbang
17a3: po 'gags na dbang po gzhan/ / gang dag ji snyed yod pa thams cad 'gag par 'gyur// de ltar shes rab spyod pa mkhas pa ma cho ga rnams kyi// pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus
17a4: par gsungs/ / byang chub sems mkhas nyan thos yon tan gang dag dang // de bzhin rang rgyal yon tan kun la slob byed cing // de dag de la mi gnas 'dod pa mi skyed de// 'di ni bdag gis
17a5: bslab bya yin snyam de phyir slob/ / mi ldog byang chub mchog la rab tu zhugs pa yi// sems bskyed pa la bsam pa thag pas yi rang ba// stong gsum ri rab srang la gzhal bas tshad bzung
17a6: rung / / rjes su yi rang dge ba de ni de lta min// dge ba don gnyer phan 'dod sems can ji snyed pa// kun gyi bsod nams phung po la yang yi rang gyur// de phyir de dag rgyal ba'i yon tan thob gyur nas//
17a7: sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir 'jig rten chos sbyin byed// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mi rtog chos rnams kun// stong dang mtshan ma med dang spros med yongs shes pa// de ni shes rab gnyis kyis
17a8: byang chub tshol mi byed/ / rnal 'byor bde shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson// nam mkha'i khams de dang ni nam mkha' der 'gal ba// yod pa ma yin gang gis kyang ni de ma thob// de bzhin shes rab

17b1: spyo mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang / / nam mkha' lta bu yin te nye bar zhi ba spyod// skye bo'i dbus na rgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di snyam du// skye bo 'di mgu bya snyam mi sems de yang byed// rdzu 'phrul sna
17b2: tshogs rab tu ston par byed mthong yang / / de la lus med sems med ming yang yod ma yin// de bzhin shes rab spyod pa nam yang 'di snyam du// byang chub rtogs nas 'gro ba yongs su dgrol mi sems// skye bo
17b3: sna tshogs dang ni bya ba med ldan pa/ / sgyu ma lta bu ston kyang rnam par mi rtog spyod// dper na sangs rgyas sprul pa sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed// byed pade la dregs pa cung zad skye mi 'gyur// de bzhin shes rab stod mkhas byang/
17b4: chub sems dpa' yang // sprul pa sgyu ma bzhin du bya ba thams cad ston// shing mkhan bzo bo mkhas pas skyes pa bud med dang // 'dra ba'i bzo byas de yang bya ba thams cad byed// de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas
17b5: byang chub sems dpa' yang / / rnam par mi rtog ye shes bya ba thams cad byed// de ltar spyod mkhas rnams la lha tshogs mang po dag/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas phyag kyang 'tshal bar byed// phyogs bcu'i
17b6: 'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas ji snyed pa'ang / / yon tan bsngags pa'i 'phreng ba yongs su brjod par mdzad// gang ga'i klung mnyam zhing na sems can ji snyed pa// de kun yongs su btag pa bzung
17b7: ste bdud gyur la/ / ba swa nyaka/ re las kyang de snyed sbrul byas kyang // de dag kun gyis mkhas la bar chad byar mi nus// g+hu rna ma bzhi yis byang chub sems dpa' mkhas stobs ldan// bdud bzhis thub par
17b8: dka' zhing bskyod par mi nus te/ / stong par gnas dang sems can yongs su mi gtong dang // ji skad smras bzhin byed dang bde gshegs byin brlabs can// de bzhin gshegs yum shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di//

18a1: 'chang tshe byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mos byed cing // bsam pa thag pas bsgrub par mngon par brtson byed na// nges pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la zhugs rig bya// chos dbyings de bzhin nyid la gnas
18a2: par mi 'gyur zhing / / dper na bar snang sprin bzhin gnas pa med par gnas// rig sngags 'chang ba gnas med mkha' rdzu gnas 'dod pa// sngags mthus dus min me tog ldan zhing byin gyis slob// de ltar
18a3: spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba/ / rtogs par byed dang sangs rgyas chos rnams dmigs mi 'gyur// 'chad par byed dang chos 'dod lta bar byed mi dmigs// 'di ni zhi 'dod yon tan
18a4: dga' ba'i gnas pa yin/ / dgra bcom rnam thar de bzhin gshegs kyis ma gtogs par// gnas pa 'di ni nyan thos rang rgyal bcas pa yi// gnas bzhi pa'i ting 'dzin rab zhi bde ldan pa// ji snyed kun
18a5: gyi mchog dadagod na med pa yin/ / mdab chags mkha' la gnas kyang ltung bar 'gyur ma yin// nya ni chu la gnas kyang 'tshubs te 'chi ba med// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan stobs
18a6: dag gis/ / pha rol son pa stong gnas mya ngan 'da' mi 'gyur// sems can kun gyi yon tan mchog tu 'gro ba dang // sangs rgyas ye shes mchog tu rmad byung mchog reg dang // chos kyi sbyin pa rab
18a7: mchog dam pa sbyin 'dod gang / / phan mdzad rnams kyi gnas mchog 'di la rten par gyis// bslab pa 'di ni 'dren pas bslab pa yongs brjod na// bslab pa ji snyed kun gyi mchog dang god na med// mkhas pa
18a8: gang zhig bslab kun pha rol 'gro 'dod pas/ / sangs rgyas bslab pa shes rab pha rol phyin 'dir slobs// 'di ni chos gter mchog dang chos mdzod dam pa yin// sangs rgyas rigs yin 'gro ba'i bde

18b1: dang skyed pa'i mdzod/ / 'das dang mabyin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams// de dag 'di las 'khrungs kyang chos dbyings zad migs// shing dang 'bras bum tog nags tshal ji skad pa/
18b2: de dag thams cad sa las yang dag 'byung zhing 'thon// 'on kyang sa la zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// yongs su mi nyams rnam par mi rtog skyo ba med// sangs rgyas sras dang nyan thos rang rgyal lnga
18b3: rnams dang / / 'gro ba kun gyi bde skyid chos rnams ji snyed pa// de kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las byung // shes rab rnams kyang zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// sems can tha ma 'bring dang mchog
18b4: gyur ji snyed pa/ / de kun ma rig las byung bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// rkyen rnams tshogs nas sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'byung // ma rig 'khrul 'khor de ni zad med 'phel ba med// ye
18b5: shes tshul sgo thabs dang rtsa ba ji snyed pa/ / de kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las byung // rkyen rnams tshogs nas las kyi 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'byung // shes rab pha rol phyin la zad med 'phel ba med/
18b6: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rten cing 'brel 'byung la// skye med zad pa med par shes rab 'di shes te// nyi ma sprin med 'od zer 'phro bas mun gsal ltar// ma rig thibs po bcom nas rang byung
18b7: thob par 'gyur/ / mthu chen ldan pa bsam gtan bzhis kyang gnas byed la// rten par byed pa ma yin gnas par byed pa med// 'on kyang bsam gtan yan lag bcas pa bzhi po 'di// byang chub dam
18b8: pa mchog thob pa yi rten du 'gyur/ / shes rab mchog thob bsam gtan dag la gnas pa ni// gzugs med ting 'dzin dam pa bzhi yang nyams su myong // bsam gtan 'di dag byang chub dam pa mchog

19a1: la phan/ byang chub sems dpa' dag pa zad byar sgrub pa ma// dan yan tan grags pa 'damar zad blang sa// bas ma k+Shan/ dang 'dzan la gnas dam par na meng// gaganas rnams gas
19a2: telus ni zhig gyur na/ / bsam pa je bzhin 'dod pa'i khams su yang ste'o// dper na 'jam gling mi zhig sngon chad lha yul gyi// lha yi grong khyer mchog tum phyin phyis song ste// de na yongs su bzung ba'i
19a3: yul de rnams mthong nas/ / khyer 'dir 'ang bar myur nachags par mi byed ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yon tan mchog 'chang ba// ral 'byor brtson te bas ma gtan teng 'dzin la gnas nas
19a4: phyir yang 'dod pa'i khams su gnas te chags pa med/ / chu'i padam bzhin du byis pa'i chos mi gnas// bdag nyid chen po sems can yongs su smin bya dang // zhing spyod pha rol byin rdzogs don byed
19a5: kho nar zad/ / byang chub yon tan pha rol phyin nyams 'gyur 'ong zhes// gzugs med khams su skye ba don du gnyer mi byed// dper na mi zhig rin chen gter rnams rnyed gyur nas// de la 'dod pa
19a6: blo ni bskyed par ma byas la/ / des kyang dus gzhan zhig na de dag yongs blangs shing // blangs nas khyim du song ste chags par mi byed ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dga' ba dang /
19a7: de sbyin bsam gtan ting 'dzin zhi bzhi thob nas// bsam gtan bde ldan bsam gtan ting 'dzin thob gtang ste// 'gro la snying brtser ldan pa'i phyir yang 'dod khams 'jug/ gal te byang chub sems
19a8: dpa' ting 'dzin bsam gtan gnas/ / dgra bcom rang rgyal theg par 'dod pa'i blo bskyed na// mnyam par ma bzhag rgod cing sems g.yengs gyur pa ste// sangs rgyas yon tan yongs nyams mnyan

19b1: bgru zhig bzhin/ / gzhan yang gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri dang ro// reg dang 'dod yon lnga la mngon par brtson gyur kyang // dgra bcom rang rgyal theg bral byang chub sems dga' na// dpa' bo rtag tu mnyam
19b2: bzhag yin par shes par bya/ / sems can gang zag gzhan phyir sems dpa' rnam dag pa// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin la mngon brtson rnam par spyod// dper na bran mo chu chun dbang med rje bo'i dbang //
19b3: de bzhin dpa' rnams sems can kun gyi dbang gis 'gro// spro ba byas sam 'on te rtag tu brdegs kyang rung // bran mo rje bo la ni zlog tshig mi smra yi// 'di yis bdag nyid bsad par 'gyur du 'ong snyam nas/
19b4: shin tu skrag pa'i yid kyis 'jigs bcas zil gyis gnon// de bzhin byang chub ched du byang chub mchog zhugs pa// 'gro ba kun la bran gyur bzhin du gnas par bya// 'di las byang chub thob cing yon tan
19b5: rdzogs par 'gyur/ / rtswa dang shing las me byung bas ni de nyid sreg/ bdag nyid bde ba btang nas re ba med se mas gyis// sems can gzhan gyi dgos la nyin mtshan mngon par brtson// bu cig pa
19b6: la ma ni rim gro byed pa ltar/ / bsam pa thag pas rnam par skyo med gnas par gyis// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig yun ring 'khor 'dod cing // sems can don dang zhing spyod brtson pa'i rnal
19b7: 'byor pa/ / skyo ba'i blo ni rdul tsam skye bar mi 'gyur na// de ni brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ldan g.yel ba med// byang chub sems dpa' mi mkhas bskal pa bye ba bgrang // gal te ring bar 'du shes
19b8: sdug bsngal byang chub sgrub/ / yang dag chos sgrub byed tshe yun ring sdug bsngal 'gyur// des ni brtson 'grus pha rol phyin nyams le lo can// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed dang po nas bzung ste// /

20a1: byang chub bla na med pa thob par 'gyur gyi bar// nyin mtshan gcig tsam du ni yid la sems byed na// mkhas pa gsal bas brtson 'grus brtsams par rig par bya// gal te dga' zhig 'di
20a2: skad ri rab ri shig pa'i/ / rjes la byang chub mchog thob 'gyur zhes smra ba las// ci ste skyo ba'i blo skyid tshad kyang sems byed na// de tshe byang chub sems dpa' le lor gyur pa yin// ji ste de ni 'di tsamachod
20a3: g+ha ci dka' zhes/ / skad cig tsam la ri rab thal bar rlag sems skyed// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste// ring por mi thogs 'dren pa'i byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// 'gro ba
20a4: yongs su smin par byas nas don bya zhes/ / gal te lus dang ngag dang yid kyis brtson byed na// bdag tu 'du shes gnas pas le lor gyur pa ste// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las ring 'gyur gnam sa bzhin//
20a5: gang tshe lum dang sems dang sems can 'du shes med// 'du shes rnam par log nas gnyis su med chos spyod// 'di ni byang chub zhi pa mi nyams mchog 'dod pa'i// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ces phan pa
20a6: mdzad pas gsungs/ / gal te gzhan las ngan brjod tshig rtsub thos gyur na// bdag bde yin zhes byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dga'// su smra sus thos gang gis gang zhig gang gi phyir// bzod pa'i
20a7: pha rol phyin mchog ldan pa 'dzangs pa yin/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bzod pa'i legs chos ldan// gang zhig stong gsum rin chen bkang ste 'jig rten mkhyen// sangs rgyas rnams dang dgra
20a8: bcom rang rgyal phul byas pa/ / sbyin pa'i phung pos de la bsod nams char mi phod// bzod lag nas pa'i lus ni yongs su dag 'gyur te// sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang mthu stobs pa mtha' yam

20b1: sems can rnams la chos rab stong pa sgrogs par byed/ / 'di ni bzod ldan de la 'gro ba dag 'gyur mkhas// gal te sems can la las tsan dan pur ma blangs// rab gus byang chub sems
20b2: dpa' la ni nyug byed la/ / gzhan zhig me mdag mgo la 'thor byed gnyi ga la// de yis mnyam zhing snyoms pa'i yid ni bskyed par bya// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas de ltar bzod byas nas/
20b3: sems bskyed de ni byang chub mchog tu yongs bsngos na// dpa' bo 'jig rten kun la bzod pas dgra bcom dang // rang rgyal sems can khams mar ji snyed zil gyis gnon// bzod byed 'di snyam du
20b4: yang sems ni skyed bya ste/ / sems dmyal dud 'gro gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal mar// 'dod pa'i yon tan rgyu yis dbang med gnod myong na// byang chub ched du ci phyir da bzod mi bya snyam//
20b5: lkug dbyig mtshon dang gsad dang bcings dang brdeg pa dang // mgo gcod pa dang rna ba rkang lag sna gcod dang // 'jig rten sdug bsngal ji snyed bdag gis bzod snyam pa// byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i
20b6: pha rol byin la gnas/ / tshul khrims kyis ni zhi ba 'dod rnams 'phags par gyur// stabs bcu'i spyod yul gnas shing tshul khrims nyams pa med// sdom pa'i bya ba ji snyed kun gyi rjes su 'jug/
20b7: sems can kun la phan phyir de yang byang chub bsngo// gal te dgra bcom rang rgyal byang chub reg 'dod na// tshul khrims 'chal cing mi mkhas de bzhin spyod pa nyams// ci ste byang chub zhi pa mchog tu
20b8: yongs bsngo na/ / 'dod yon brtson yang tshul khrims pha rol phyin la gnas// chos gang nges pa'i byang chub yon tan 'byung 'gyur ba// 'di ni yon tan chos ldan rnams kyi tshul khrims don//

21a1: chos gang phan byed rnams kyi byang chub yongs nyams pa// 'ad ni tshul khrims 'tshal ces rnam par 'dren pas gsungs// gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'dod yon lnga spyod kyang // sangs rgyas chos da
21a2: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun skyabs song ste/ / sangs rgyas 'grub bya snyam du kun mkhyen yid byed na// mkhas pa tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas rig par bya// gal te bskal pa bye bar dge ba'i las lam bcu/
21a3: spyod kyang dgra bcom dang rgyal nyid la 'dod spyad na// de tshe tshul khrims skyon byung tshul khrims nyams pa yin// sems bskyed de ni bas pam bas kyang shin tu li// tshul khrims srung zhing byang chub mchog
21a4: tu yongs bsngo la/ / de yis rlom sems med cing bdag bstod mi byed la// nga yi 'du shes sems can 'du shes yongs su spangs// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas brjod//
21a5: gal te byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i lam spyod pa// sems can 'di dag khrims ldan 'di dag khrims 'chal zhes// sna tshogs 'du shes zhugs pa shin tu tshul khrims 'tshal// tshul khrims
21a6: nyams shing de la yongs dag tshul khrims med/ / gang la bdag gi 'du shes sems can 'du shes med// 'du shes 'dod chags bral la sdom min ga la yod// gang la sdom dang sdom pa ma yin rlom
21a7: sems med/ / 'di na tshul khrims sdom par rnam par 'dzin pas gsungs// sems can dag pa gang shigad ltar khrims ldan pa// sdug dang ma sug kun la lta ba med pa yin// mgo dang rga
21a8: lag gtong shing zhum pa'i sems kyang med/ / bdog pa thams cad gtong zhing rtag tu zhen pa med// chos rnams rang bzhin bdag med ya ma rlar shes nas// bdag gi sha yang gtong zhing zhum pa'i

21b1: sems med na/ / de tshe phyi rol dngos po gtod pa smos ci dgos// gal te ser sna byed pa de ni gnas med do// bdag du 'du shes dngos la bdag gir 'dzin pas chags// blun po rnams la gtong ba'i blo
21b2: lta ga la yod/ / ser sna can ni yid btags gnas su skye bar 'gyur// ci ste mir skyes na yang de tshe dbul por 'gyur// de tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can dbul shes nas// gtong la mos par gyur zhing rtag
21b3: tu lhug par gtong / / gling bzhi legs par brgyan pa mchil ma'i thal ba 'dra// byin nas dga' bar 'gyur gyis gling thob de lta min// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gsal ba srid gsum gyis// sems can
21b4: ji snyed de dag kun la byin pa 'di/ / byin par gyur cig snyam du bsam nas sbyin byin la// de yang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub mchog tu bsngo// sbyin pa byin nas dngos la gnas pa byed pa med// de ni nam du
21b5: 'ang rnam par smin la re ba med/ / de ltar gtong la mkhas pa thams cad stong pa ste// chung ngu btang la mang po dpag tu med par 'gyur// srid pa gsum na sems can ma lus ji snyed pa// yongs
21b6: su brtag par bzung ste de dag thams cad kyis/ / 'jig rten mkhyen pa sangs rgyas dgra bcom rang rgyal la// bskal pa mtha' yas sbyin byin nyan thos legs tshol na// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas
21b7: pa thabs mkhas gang zhig gis/ / de dag bsod nams bya ba'i dngos la yi rang nas// sems can don du byang chub mchog rab yongs bsngo na// yongs su bsngos pas 'gro ba thams cad zil gyis gnon/ nor bu
21b8: mching bu'i phung po chen por gyur pa yang / rin chen bai dUr+ya cig de kun zil gyis gnon// de bzhin 'gro kun sbyin pa'i phung po brgya chen kun// rjes su yi rang byang chub sems dpas zil gyis gnon// gal te byang chub sems dpas 'gro la sbyin byin nas//

22a1: de la bdag gir mi byed dngos po pangs med na// de las dge ba'i rtsa ba mthu chen 'phel 'gyur te// sprin med 'od ldan zla dkyil yar gyi ngo bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pas yid btags 'gro ba gcod// /
22a2: 'bul ba dang ni de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad gcod// spyod tshe longs spyod mtha' yas rgyas pa thob par 'gyur// sbyin pas sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sems can yongs smin byed/ khrims kyis dud 'gro'i 'gro ba du ma'i
22a3: ngo bo dang / mi khom brgyad spong de yis dal ba rtag tu rnyed // bzod pas gzugs bzang dam pa rgya chen thob 'gyur te// gser mdog sdug cing 'gro bas lta ba'i 'os su 'gyur// brtson 'grus kyis ni dkar po'i
22a4: yon tan 'grib mi 'gyur/ / ye shes mtha' yas rgyal ba'i bang mdzod rnyed par 'gyur// bsam gtan gyis ni 'dod pa'i yon tan smad pa 'dor// rig dang mngon par shes dang ting 'dzin mngon par sgrub// shes
22a5: rab kyis ni chos kyi rang bzhin yongs shes nas/ / khams gsum ma lus pa las yang dag 'da' bar 'gyur// mi'i khyu mchog 'khor lo rin chen bskor byas nas// sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir 'gro la
22a6: chos kyang ston/ / chos 'di yongs rdzogs byas nas byang chub sems dpa' de// yongs dag zhing dang sems can dag pa yongs su 'dzin// sangs rgyas rgud dang chos kyi rgyud kyang yongs su 'dzin// de bzhin dge
22a7: 'dun rgud dang chos kun yongs su 'dzin/ / 'gro ba'i nad gso mdzad pa sman pa'i mchog gyur pas// shes rab bstan pa byang chub lam ldan 'di gsungs te// ming ni yon tan rin chen sdud pa byang chub lam// lam 'di sems
22a8: can kun gyis thob par bya phyir bshad/ / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdud pa tshigs su cad pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bad+hi ka ra sid ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de dpal rtsegs kyis rgyur cing zhus te btan la phab pa'o//

22b1: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su pri kran ta bi kra mi pa ri pri tsa pra dz+nyA bA ra mi ta nir de sha/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas zhus pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa/
22b2: bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i
22b3: tshal bya ka lan d+ha ka gnas pa na/ / dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus pa skye ba gcig gis thogs
22b4: pa tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis ltas te chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
22b5: sems dpa' chen po rab kyi brtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de bstan las langs te/ / bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas
22b6: pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i
22b7: slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs bye na/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so// de skad ces gsol
22b8: pa dang / / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab kyi brtsal gyis rnam par gnon//

23a1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pade dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces
23a2: bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi brtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab
23a3: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
23a4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
23a5: byin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pan bdud sdig can gyis glags mi rnyed
23a6: cing bdud kyi las thams cad kyang rtogs par 'gyur lags/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ji lta bus gnas na myur du thams cad mkhyen
23a7: panyid kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi brtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa la 'di
23a8: skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don dang / ci nas khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten

23b1: la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo bal ba ci'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing / da ltar gyi dang / ma'ongs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la sdang bar byed par 'dod
23b2: pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pib sangs rgyas la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ba legs so legs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin dubyang chub sems dpa'
23b3: sems dpa' chen po rab kyi brtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa khyod don gyi dbang gang mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di lta bu 'dri/ de skad
23b4: ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la sman pa dang /
23b5: sems can thams cad la snying rtse ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
23b6: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / chos thams cad sdud pa lags pab slad du'o//
23b7: bcom ldan 'das de la sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa la nges par gyur pa de dag gis zos dmyur du zag pa ma mchis pa'as mngon sum du bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag rang sangs rgyas
23b8: theg pa la nges par gyur pa de dag kyang myur du rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang myur du

24a1: bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag yang dag pa nyid skyon myed pa la ma zhugs shing sa gsum la ma nges pa de dag gis bos na bla na myed pa yang
24a2: dag par rdzogs pa byang chub kyi sa mas bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zhus pa'alan btab bas sems can thams cad kyi dge bi'i rtsa ba bskyed
24a3: par 'gyur ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams kyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la
24a4: zhu ba ma lags/ dbul po'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ dbul ba'i thag pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ le lo'i sems can rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ le lo 'azil
24a5: gyis non pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ lta ba'i 'dam du byin pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ bdud kyi zhags pas zin pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags// ngo tsha ma 'tshal cing khrel ma mchis pa rnams kyi slad du ma
24a6: lags/ yo byad bskangs pa dang kyi ldan pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ bskrad nges pa rnams kyi skad du ma lags/ sems 'khrul pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ 'dod pa'i 'dam dra byin pa rnams kyis
24a7: dum lags/ yon can rnams kyi skad du pa lags/ sna ma can rnarnams kyi skad du ma lags/ bgyis pa myi gzo ba rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ sdig pa 'tshal ba rnams kyi slad du ma lags/
24a8: sdig pa spyod pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ tshul khrims nyams pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags// lta ba nyams pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags/

24b1: sdig pa'i las bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ bdag la stod pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ gzhan la smod pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ rnyed pa dang bskur sti la gdu ba rnams kyi
24b2: slad du ma lags/ lhung bzed dang // chos gos la chags pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ tshul chos pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ khags gcan rnams kyi slad du ma lags// gzhog slong can rnams
24b3: kyi slad du ma lags/ thob kyis 'jal ba rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ rnyed pa las rnyed pa sgrub pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de lta bu rnams kyi slad du bdag de bzhin
24b4: gshegs pa la zhus pa ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshol ba dang / chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes dang / rang byung gi ye shes dang / mi mnyam
24b5: pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes tshol ba de dag dang / gang dag bdag dang pha rol kyang myi dmyigs na/ bdag la skrod pa dang / gzhan la smod pa lha ga la mchis te/ bcom ldan
24b6: 'das dra bcad pa lta bur nga rgyal ma mchis pa/ zug rngu phyung ba/ gdol phra lta bur sems dma' ba/ sems sa dang chu dang mye dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems can rnams dang /
24b7: byang chub sepas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi slad du bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyang myi dmyigs shing / rlom sems su myi bgyid la
24b8: mngon par zhen pa ma mchis na/ / chos ma lags pa lta ga la mchis te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi slad du bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu lags so// bcom ldan

25a1: 'das bsam pa dag pa/ g.yom mchis pa/ sgyum mchis pa/ drang ba sems mnyam pa/ sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / snying brtse ba can yang dag par 'dzin du
25a2: stsol ba/ yang dag par gzer bstod pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar bgyid pa/ khur chen po khyer ba/ theg pa chen po la mngon par zhugs pa/ bgyi ba chen pos so sor nye bar gnas pa
25a3: snyid rje chen po dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad bde ba thob par bgyid pa 'dren pa/ rnam par 'dren pa/ yongs su 'dren pa/ chos thams cad la myi rten par gnas pa/ skye ba'i gnas thams
25a4: cad mye tshol ba/ / bdud kyi zhags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ 'dun pa can/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ bag mchis pa/ chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa la/
25a5: mkhas pa'i sems can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi slad du bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi ye
25a6: shes la yang rlom sems su myi bgyid cing mngon par myi zhen la chags par myi gnas shing / rlom sems thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i lam la gnas pa/ lam du zhugs pa/ lam
25a7: snyan pa'i sems can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi slad du bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag na
25a8: sems can thams cad la bde ba dang / ltag na ma mchis pa'i bde ba dang / bla na ma mchis pa'i bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bde ba dang / 'dus ma bgyis kyi ba

25b1: ba nye bar bsgrub par 'tshal te/ bdag sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni the tshom ma
25b2: mchis par 'tshal zhing the tshom ma mchis nas kyang sems can rnams kyi the tshom rab tu spang ba'i slad du chos bshad par 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can thams cad kyi the tshom bsal ba'i slad
25b3: du bcom ldan 'das la zhu lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad ni sdug bsngal dang mi 'thun zhing bde ba 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad ni bde ba don du gnyer
25b4: ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab ma gtogs par gzhan sems can rnams kyi bde ba gang yang bdag gis ma mthong zhing / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa theg pa chen po ma rtogs
25b5: par gzhan sems can rnams kyi bde ba gang yang ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas sems can rnams la bde ba nye bar bsgrub par 'tshal ba'i slad du shes rab
25b6: pha rol tu phyin pa zhu lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don 'di yang dag par mthong bas bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang /
25b7: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab kyi brtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa legs so// legs so//
25b8: khyod skye bo phal po che la snying rtse ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba ni khyod kyi yon tan gyi mtha' rtogs par sla ba ma yin no// de'i phyir rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon

26a1: ba legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam
26a2: par gnon pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa khyod 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab
26a3: kyi pha rol tubyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi zhes zer ba ni/ rab kyi
26a4: rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshig thams cad las 'das pa'o// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon
26a5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu zhi ni 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// 'dis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes
26a6: brjod par myi nus so/ / rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par
26a7: gnon pa shes rab nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pas ma brnyes ma dmyigs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lta dmyigs par gal 'gyur/ rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa shes rab ces bya ba 'di ni chos
26a8: thams cad kun tu shes pa 'di ni chos thams cad kun tu rig pa ste/ de'i phyir shes rab ces bya'o// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa chos thams cad kun tu rig pa gang zhe na/ chos 'di dag

26b1: thams cad ni rnam pa gzhan na chos thams cad rnam pa gzhan du brjod de/ chos thams cad ni brjod pa las rnam par grol ba ma yin no// gang chos thams cad kun du shes pa dang / gang chos thams
26b2: cad kun du rig pa de yang tshig gis brjod par myi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang ji ltar sems can rnams kyis shes par gyur pa de ltar shes rab ces bya'o// 'di ni btags pa zhes bya ste/ de'i phyir shes
26b3: rab ces bya'o/ / rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa chos thams cad ni gdags su med/ gzung du byed/ bshad du med/ snang ba med de/ de lta bur kun du rig pa de ni kun du rig pa zhes bya'o// ra
26b4: kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa shes rab ces bya ba de ni kun shes pa yang ma yin/ kun mi shes pa yang ma yin/ de las kyang ma yin/ de las ma yin pa yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir shes rab
