257a2: cad rtsub par byed pa tha la pan nang sa na/ gas ces pacan// de bzhin gshegs padu ldan cigs nyin pa k+Shas pa / de rgyun tu ba 'thams pan/ sarbA
257a3: rgyal pos bos te/ bu nag po 'char ka bdag gi sras blta bar 'dod pas skyes bu stong phrag dgu btang ste mi gcig kyang 'ongs nas spring yi gtsam gyi lo rgyas ci yang ma byung / slar yang thams cad nad kyis thabs
257a4: ba yin nam tshe'i bar chad du gyur pa yin nam/ bdag 'tsho ba nyid kyi bar tu sras po lta bar 'dod de bdag gi bu lta bar nus sam zhes smras so// lha nus lags so// gal te rab tu phyung yang blta bar nus so//
257a5: bu khyod rab tu byung ba'am ma byung yang / nga sras po blta'o zhes smras so// des lha legs so legs so zhes rgyal po'i gsung blangs nas rgyal po'i khab du song ste/ ston pa chos ston pa'i dus su 'kho ro rnams kyi
257a6: mthar 'khod de chos thos nas 'khor dang bcas pa dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te dge slong gi dngos por so sor gnas so/ / ston pa sangs rgyas su gyur nas dang po'i lo la drang srong lhung ba'i gnas
257a7: su dbyar bzhugs te/ dgag dbye byas nas steng rgyas su gshegs shing der zla ba gsum bzhugs te/ ral pa can spun rnams brtul nas dge slong stong phrag gcig gi 'khor dang bcas pa dgun zla 'bring po'i
257a8: nyal rgyal po'i khab du gshegs nas zla ba nyis bzhugs so/ / de rnams ni grong khyer bA ra na sI nas 'ongs pa'i 'bar ste/ zla ba lnga song zhing dgun gyi dus thams cad 'das so// gnas brtan 'char ka 'das nas zhag

257b1: bdun dang brgyad song ngo / / des dpyid zla ba'i nya la bsams pa/ dgun gyi dus 'das nas dpyid kha'i dus su slab pa dang // mi rnams kyis 'bru rnams blangs te/ phyogs phyogs nas la ba du byung bas rtswa rnams
257b2: ljang gur gyur to/ / sa gzhi dang nags tshal gyi shing la sogs pa be tog shin tu mang ba khabye ba ni lam du 'gro ba'i dus so// stobs bcu pa'i nye du dang phrad par byed pa'i lam du 'gro ba'i dus yin no// de nas bcom ldan
257b3: 'das kyis drung du nye bar song nas/ btsun pa ljon shing de ni ljang gur gyur// shing g.yo ma sa la dud pa dang // de rnams par nas 'od zer 'gyed pa yin// dpa' bo chen po gnyen gnas gshegs pa'i dus/
257b4: ha cang mi dri ma phreng zhing // mu ge dang ni bkres pa med// sa steng shing rnams ljang gur gyur// thub pa chen po dus 'dir 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa drug bcu tsam gyis stobs bcu pa la rigs kyi grong khyer du gshegs
257b5: pa'i phyir bsngags par 'os pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'o/ / de nas ston pa la char kas dbyangs stan pos gshegs pa'i bsngags par 'os pa'i bsngags pa gsungs so// btsun pa khyed kyi yab rgyal po chen po zas gtsang
257b6: blta bar 'dod pas nye du rnams rjes su 'dzin par zhu legs so 'char gnye du rnams rjes su bzung bar bgyi'o zhes dge slong gi dge 'dun la spros cig/ gshegs pa'i gnas thams cad la byi dor gyis
257b7: shig ces smos shig/ btsun pas legs so zhes gnas gtan song nas smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis yul oM g+ha dang ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams stong phrag bcu dang bcas pa grong khyer ser
257b8: skya'i gzhin gnas pa'i stong phrag bcu po thams cad zag pa zad pa'i dge slong 'khor du byas nas rgyal po'i khab nas phyi rol tu 'thon te/ nyi ma re re la dpag tshad re re bzod cing rgyal po'i khab nas dpag tshad bcu'i

258a1: grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir zla ba gnas kyis slob par dgangs shing bral ba yang ma yin byung ba yang ma yin par 'brang por gshegs so/ / gnas brtan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das byan nas rnal rdza
258a2: drung du smra'o zhes bas mnas nam mkha' la song ste rgyal po'i gnas su sleb par gyur to/ / rgyal pos gnas brtan gzigs nas thugs tshim par gyur te gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su bcug go// rang la byed pa
258a3: bzhin bcos nas ro sna tshogs pa'i bza' bas lhung bzed bkang nas phul lo/ / gnas brtan langs nas 'gro ba mas bas pa dang / bu bzhugs la gsol cig rtsu po dpo ston pa dang nye bar song ste bza'o// slar yang dra
258a4: ston pa gan yod/ stong phrag nyi shu'i dge slong 'khor du byas nas rgyal po chen po nyid blta ba'i phyir byon no// rgyal po thugs tshim par gyur nas smras pa// khyed 'di gsol la bdag gi sras grong khyer 'dir ma byon gyi
258a5: bar la 'di nyid nas lhung bzed du bza' ba khyer la sod cig ces smras so/ / gnas brtan gyis rgyal po'i gsung mnyan te rgyal pos gnas brtan gyi bza' ba gsol zin pa dang lhung bzed bkrus nas dri zang po'i/ bye mas thugs
258a6: te bza' ba mchog gis gang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul cig zhes smras nas gnas brtan gyi lag pas byin no/ / gnas brtan mi thams cad kyis mthong ba dang lhung bzed nam mkha' la 'phangs so//
258a7: rang nyid kyang nam mkha' la gshegs nas bza' ba'i lhung bzed bzung ste/ ston pa'i phyag tu phul nas ston pas kyang der bza' ba la longs spyod do// gnas brtan thabs 'di'i nyi ma re re bzhin du bza' ba phul lo// ston
258a8: bas kyang lam gyi bar du rgyal po nyid kyis gdugs chod la longs spyod do/ / gnas brtan gyis kyang gdugs chod la longs spyod pa'i mthar nyi ma ri nga bzhin du di ring 'di tsam nas bcom ldan 'das byonano// ring 'di tsam du

258b1: nga / na du rnam sa rnam du du du ngas nga gA
258b2: mtshan gyis gnas brtan la bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag ba dag gi nyin kyis kyi nang nas rigs dang bar byed pa rnams kyi ma tog yin gdan 'di ni 'cha krinas pa'o/ / 'di sa chog tug rngubs ba
258b3: kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das rjes su byan pa'i thun la bdag cag/ nye du'i gtso bo blta'o zhes 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i gnas rtog cing shAkya n+da kro d+hA'i kun dga' rab yid du 'ong ba ste gon byas so// der thams
258b4: cad nyer bstsogs byas nas spros dang me rtog so so lag tu thogs te/ bsu ba byed cing rgyan thams cad kyis so sor brgyan nas gzhon du dang gzhon du mgrong khyer gyi khye'u dang bu mo sngar dang por btang ba rnams dang / de nas
258b5: rgyal po'i gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma dag de rnams kyi bar rang gis spos dang me tog dang phye ma la sogs pas mchod pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nyid du byon no dar bcom
258b6: ldan 'das kyis stong phrag nyi shu'i zag pa zad pa'i dge slong 'khor du byas nas gdan bshams pa mchog la sangs rgyas bzhugs so/ / shAkya'i rigs ni nga rgyal dang ldan pa yin/ sems rtsub pa yin pas 'di ni don
258b7: grub gzhon nu deng dang lhan cig gzhon nu yin no/ / nga pung ba dang / da phreng sum / mam da na pasabs pa/ khye'u dang rgyal po'i gzhon nu zhes smras te/ khyed kyi phyag gis bdag khyed kyi rtsub tu rjod de zhes bsams ca/
258b8: de rnams de bzhin du gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa gzigs nas gnyen rnams bdag la phyag mi byed par 'dod kyang da ltar phyag byed du bzhugs dgos te/ mngon par shes pa'i gzhi dang

259a1: le shes dang bsam gzha dang rnams par 'dugs bsdud dgasas rnam9/ ban sa nas rnamamapa' phags so// darnams thamag sa gams kyi rul rtsu pa s+ya rbA sa
259a2: shing gdung du mo ma tsho 'phrul dang mtshungs par tho khrul mdza do/ / rgyal bas de'i ma mtshan che ba mthong de zhes smras so// bcom ldan 'das khyed 'khrungs pa'i rten mo// dka' thub pa nag po len gyis phyag
259a3: nye bar gnas pas khyed kyis zhabs bskyod pa bram ze'i spyi ba la nye bar gnas so/ / de mthong nas bdag gis kyang khyed la phyag byas so// 'di ni bdag gis phyag dang po yin no// bkra shis pa'i 'bru 'debs pa'i nyin ma
259a4: 'dzam bu'i shing gi grib ma'i dpal gyi mal stan la khyed bzhugs pa na shing 'dzam bu'i grib mas ma btang bar mthong ba'i tshe yang zhabs la phyag byas so/ / 'di ni bdag gi phyag gnyis pa yin nod lta ni bdag gis sngar ma mthong
259a5: ba'i cho 'phrul yang mthong bas khyed kyi zhags la phyag bgyid do/ / 'di ni bdag gi phyag gsum pa yin no// slar ya nga rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la phyag byed cing phyag byed par mi nus pa'i shAkya'i rigs gcig
259a6: kyang med do/ / thams cad kyis kyang phyag byed pa nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la nye du rnams kyis phyag byed cing nam mkha' las babs nas gdan bshams pa'i mchog gi gung la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
259a7: nas nye du nams 'dus par gyur pa la thams cad sems gcig tu gnas so/ / de nas sprin chen po las pad ma'i mdab ma la chu mi 'chags pa lta bu'i chad 'bebs so// chu zangs kyi mdog can sa la sgra sgrogs shing
259a8: 'bab po 'bar bar 'dod pa rnams 'bad do/ / 'bang bar mi 'dod pa rnams mi dbang ngo // thigs pa tsam yang mi ltong ngo // de mthong nas thams cad du ya mtshan pa dang rmad du byung ba skyes so// e maho ngo mtshar che/

259b1: e ma to rmad du byung ngo zhes brjod par byed do// ston pas 'di kho na ma yin gyi bdag gi nye du dang phrad pa na pad ma'i mdab ma la chu mi 'chags pa lta bu'i char 'bebs shing 'das pa'i dus su 'ang ngas phab bo// 'di'i don
259b2: byung ba ni thams cad sgrol gyi skye rabs su bshad do/ / chos ston pa thos nas thams cad langs te phyag byas nas song ngo // cig gis kyang rgyal po dang rgyal tsha ba dang blon po rnams sad bdag gi gnas su bsod snyoms
259b3: khyer 'ong ngo zhes smras pa sod pa de rnams las gcig kyang ma byung ngo / / ston pas slar nyi ma gnyis pa la stong phrag nyi shu'i dge slong 'khor du byas nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir bsod snyoms la bzhud do// gang zhig 'gron
259b4: du gnyer bar dang / lhung bzed khyer ba su yang med do// bcom ldan 'das sgo drung du 'khod de rnam par brtags pas ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi rigs kyi grong khyer du byon nas bsod snyoms mdzad pa bzhin du
259b5: gang ji ltar rigs par mi chen po'i khyim du 'gro zhing yang na go rims bzhin du bsod snyoms spyod do/ / de nas sangs rgyas gcig gis kyang ji ltar rigs par gshegs pa ma mthong bas bdag gis kya da ni 'di'i rigs so// 'di
259b6: sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs bzhin du bdag gis kyang rigs par gzung bar bya'o/ / bdag gi nyan thos kyang bdag nyid bzhin rjes su slob cing bsod snyoms la rdzogs par byon no// 'khod pa'i khyer nas gzung nas
259b7: go rims bzhin du bsod snyoms la spyod do/ / 'phags pa gzhon nu don grub bsod snyoms la gshegs so zhes brjod do// nyes thos dang sum thog la sogs pa'i khang bzang rnams su ste dge sgo chung bye nas ma
259b8: t hams cad blta bar gyur te lha mo sgra can 'dzin gyi yum yang 'phags pa'i bgrong khyer 'di nyid du rgyal po chen po'i mthas gser gyi do la la sogs pa la zhon te de ring nas skra dang kha spu bregs shing ngur smrig gagos

260a1: gyon nas snod lag du khyer te bsod snyoms la 'gro ba mdzes sam mi mdzes zhes steng gi sgo chung bye nas blta'o/ / sna tshogs pa'i 'dod chags dang thal ba yang dag par 'bar zhing ska lus kyi 'od kyis grong khyer
260a2: kyigyisteng thams cad snang bar mdzad do/ / 'dom gang ba'i 'od kun nas skor zhing rab tu gsal ba dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu dang ldan pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa sangs rgyas kyi dpal dpe med
260a3: par rnam par gsal ba mthong ngo / / gtsug tor nas bzung nas zhabs kyi mthil gyi bar de srid do// dbu skra g.yas 'khyil 'jam gnag snum pa dang // dpral ba dra med nyi ma'i mthil bzhin no// skra dang 'tsham ba'i shangs ni mtho
260a4: dang / / mi yi seng ge 'od zer gsal ba mdzad 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i mi'i seng ge la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod do// khyed kyi sras po bsod snyoms la spyod do zhes rgyal po la smras so// rgyal po'i sems sdug bsngal bas gos nas/
260a5: gzungs te myur zhing myur bar phyir 'thon te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'khod nas smras pa/ ci btsun pa bdag cag ngo tshabs ci'i don du bsod snyoms mdzad/ dge slong 'di rnams kyi bza' ba bdag gis ster bar mi shes bsams pa yin/
260a6: nam ci lags/ rgyal po chen po'i rigs kyi spyod pa yin no// btsun pa bdag cag shAkya'i rigs zhes bya ba'i rigs so// de la rgyal rigs gcig kyang bsod snyoms byed pa'i ming tsam yang med do// rgyal po chen po'i rigs zhes bya ba ni khyod kyi rigs
260a7: 'di yin no/ / bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mi dbyes pa ma mdzad cig/ slar yang bdag cag gis mar med mdzad dang kau Di n+ya dang 'od srung zhes bya ba 'di sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin no// 'di rnams dang gzhan sangs rgyas stong
260a8: phrag du mas kyang bsod snyoms spyod cing 'tsho bar mdzad la/ srang gi dbus su 'khod pa nyid do// bag med lhag mar byed pa med/ chos la spyod cing legs par spyod// chos la spyad na bde ba 'byung // 'jig rten 'di dang phyi bar bde

260b1: can pa gas cad pa ga ba dang/ / chags sa pa pa'im par rtsal pas ldan du 'gas par 'thas la// 'byung / na 'gas pa byud/ sa pa yang ba rtan/
260b2: yis bde ba 'byung // 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du'o// slar yang chos kyi rkang pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos nas lan cig phyir 'ong gi 'bras pa thob par gyur to// chos sbyor ba'i sbyor bas thos nas phyir mi 'ong
260b3: ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur to/ / 'chi ba'i dus su gdugs dkar po'i 'og tu dpal gyi mal stan gyi steng du gzims pa nyid na dgra bcom pa thob par 'gyur to// dgon par gnas nas bka' thab spyod pa rgyal po la
260b4: dgos pa med do/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed bzung te/ 'khor dang bcas pa khang bzang chen po'i steng du spyan drangs nas gya nom pa'i bza' ba dang bcas
260b5: pa rnams drangs so/ / gdugs chod zin pa'i mthar sgra gcan 'dzin gyi ma ma gtogs pa'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas so// gzhan yang des 'khor gyi mi
260b6: rnams la 'phags pa'i thal phyag gyis shes brjod nas/ gal te kho mo la yon tan yod na 'phags pa'i bu rang nyid la gnas su 'byon no// byon pa nyid na de la phyag byed do zhes brjod nas ma 'ongs so// rgyal pos ltung
260b7: bzed bzung nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos mchog gnyis dang bcas pargyal ba'i bu mo'i khang bzangs su gshegs te/ rgyal po'i bu mo rang nyid ji ltar mos pa'i phyag byed cing gzhan dang 'gal ba cung zad kyang ma byed
260b8: ces nas gdan bshams pa mchog gi gung la bzhugs so/ / de myur du 'ongs nas byin pa bzung ste/ zhugs kyi steng du mgo bo bzhag nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i phyag byas so// rgyal po dang rgyal po'i bu mos bcom ldan

261a1: 'das la dga' ba mang pos yon tan la sogs pas yon tan dang ldan par brjod nas/ btsun pa bdag gi zu mos nyid kyis gos ngur smrig rgyan thas nas/ de nas bzung ste de dag bar du gos du
261a2: smig gon no/ / nyid kyis gdugs tshed lan cig gsol ba thos nas bu mos kyang bza' ba lan cig zos so// nyid kyis mal stan chen po spangs pa thos nas/ nyal khri chung ba la nyal lo// nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba dang
261a3: spos la sogs pa la sred pa med pa thos nas/ me tog gi phreng ba dang spos la sogs pa la chags pa med pa skyes so// rang gi nye du rnams bdag gis gso'o zhes 'phrin bskur nas/ gnyen cig la yang blta ba mi 'dug go/
261a4: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa ni bdag gi bu mo yin no zhes gsol to// rgyal po chen po la mtshan miche'o// 'dir lta khyed srung bar byed pa'i rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes yongs su ma smin pa rang gis bsrung ngo //
261a5: sngar bsrung ba med cing ri la sogs pa la 'gro ba na/ ye shes yongs su pa rdzogs pa rang gis bsrung so zhes gsungs nas/ mi 'am ci zla ba'i skyes rabs gsungs te gtan las bzhengs nas gshegs so// nyi ma gnyis pa
261a6: la rgyal bu gzhon nu dga' bo rgyal por dbang bskur ba dang / khang pa gsar ba'i nang du zhugs te bkra shis pa'i bag ma blangs nas nye bar gnas so// de'i khyim du gshegs nas gzhon nu lhung bzed zung cig ces rab pu dbyung bar
261a7: dgongs nas bkra shis brjod de/ gdan la bzhengs nas gshegs so// ljongs kyi dge ba'i bu mos 'gro ba mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i bu myur du shog ces brjod nas blta'o// des kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed bzang
261a8: bar ma nus nas gtsug lag khang nyid du gshegs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de la 'dod pa med pa nyid kyis rab tu 'byung ba byed do// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ser skyar gshegs shing nyi ma gsum pa la dga' bo

261b1: rab tu byung bar byas so/ / nyi ma bdun pa la sgra gcan 'dzin gyi mas gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du btang ngo // bu stong phrag nyi shu'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa 'di rnams ltos/ gser
261b2: gyi kha dog can gyi tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi mdog can dge sbyong 'di ni khyed kyi yab bo/ / 'di la gter chen po yod cing de 'thon pa nas gzung nas gter mthong ba med de// sor la nor slongs shig/ bdag khyed
261b3: kyi thugazhon nu yin no/ / rgyal por dbang bskur ba thob nas 'khor los sgyur ba la dbang byed par 'gyur ro// bdag la nor gyi don du nor stsal du gsol// yab gyi nor bu bdag yin no zhes gsol cig ces smras pa dang
261b4: gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar song ste/ yab kyi drung du dga' bi skyes so// sems spro bar gyur to// dge sbyong des khyed kyi grib ma ni de'o zhes brjod nas/ gzhan yang rang gi rigs pas rjod cing 'khod do// bcom
261b5: ldan 'das gdugs tshod kyi mthar rjes su yi rang ba mdzad nas gdan la bzhengs te gshegs so/ / gzhon nus padag la dge slong nor stsal du gsol// bdag la dge slong nor stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes
261b6: su 'brangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu phyir log la nga'i rjes su ma 'gro zhes pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das dang 'grogs nas byan te ldog par ma nus nas/ gzhon nu bcom ldan
261b7: 'das dang lhan cig kun dga' ra ba nyid du phyin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsams pa/ 'di yab kyi nor 'dod cing 'jig rten pa'i nor ni 'tshe ba dang bcas pa yin/ nga ni gzhon nu la byang chub snying po des thob pa'i
261b8: 'phags pa'i nor rnam pa bdun byin na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gyi bdag po byed par 'gyur bar dgongs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu bos te/ de'i phyir na sha ri'i bu khyod kyis gzhon nu sgra gcan 'dzin

262a1: rab tu byung zhes brjod nas rab tu byung ba byas so/ / slar yang rgyal po gzhon nu'i sdug bsngal cher skyes te bsran par ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas su phyin te/ btsun pa 'phags pa mad
262a2: yis rjes su ma nas khrol tu 'byung bar byed pa ma legs so zhes dam pa bgrangs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de ladam bgyid do// sgrur yang nyim gnyis pal rgyal po'i gnas su gzugs tshod gsal nas phyogs /
262a3: tu 'khod do// rgyal pos btsun pa nyid bka' ba spyod pa'i dus su lha gcig bdag gi drung du nye bar 'ongs nas khyed kyi bu dus las 'das so zhes smras so// de'i tshig la yid ches pa med cing bdag gi sras byang chub ma thob
262a4: bar du dus las 'da' bar mi byed do/ / de'i tshe bdag gis bkag go zhes brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'aka' stsal ba/ dalta ji ltar khyod yid ches par byed/ sngar rus pa mthong nas khyed kyi bu sho'i zhes zer
262a5: pa la yid ches par ma byas so/ / 'di'i don 'byung ba chos skyong ba ni chen po'i skye rabs su bshad do// gtam gyi mthar rgyal pos phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas so// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi yab 'bras bu
262a6: gsum la so sor gnas nas dge slong gi dge 'dun 'khor du byas so/ / slar yang rgyal po'i khab du gshegs nas shel ba'i tshal du bzhugs so// de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis shing rta lnga brgya'i nor khyed
262a7: nas rgyal po'i khab du rang nyid dga' ba'i grogs kyi khang par song ste/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byon no zhes pa thos nas shin du snga bar lha'i mthus sgo byiste/ ston pa'i drung du nye bar song na chos mo te n+danaH
262a8: zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur to/ / nyi ma gnyis pa la sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun la byin pa chen po phul lo// mnyan yod du gshegs pa'i phyir du ston pa'i drung ngu dam bca' blangs nas par bya laH/

262b1: dag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i gnas su 'bum phrag re re'i nor byin nas dpag tshad re ro'i gtsug lag khang byas so// rgyal byed tshal bye ba phrag brgya ban brgyad kyi dbyig gis nyos nas las lags rab byed cing dbus su
262b2: stobs bcu ba'i dri gtsang khang byed do/ / de la bskor ba rnams la gnas brtan chen po brgyad bcu'i bzhugs gnas so// tshig thog dang nyis thog dang khang pa ring po dang // bsti gnas la sogs pa'i
262b3: bzhugs gnas dang / / rdzing bu dang / 'chags dang // mtshan mo'i bzhugs gnas dang // nyin mo'i bzhugs gnas so// bye ba phrag bcwa brgyad kyi nor spel te yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs yid la
262b4: 'thad pa'i gtsug lag khang byed do/ / stobs bcub 'byon pa'i phyir du pho nya ba btang ngo // ston pa sa pho nya ba'i 'phrin gsan nas dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po'i 'khor du byas te rgyal po'i khab nas phyir byon te
262b5: go rims bzhin du grong khyer mnyan yod du byon no/ / gtso bo chen po gtsug lag khang chen po lha gon byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal byed tshal du byon pa'i nyin mo bu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan no// slar
262b6: yang brgyan pa nyid kyi gzhon nu lnga brgya dang bcas pa btang ngo / / de 'khor dang bcas pa kha dog lnga'i gos yang dag par 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan lnga brgya thogs nas// stobs bcu pa'i mdun du song bar gyur to//

263a1: de rnams kyi phyi ma la legs bzangs chen mo dang / legs bzangs mchung ba ste bu mo gnyis gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang bcas pa gsad kyis gang ba'i bum pa lag par thogs nas kyi 'dzin
263a2: no/ / de'i phyi ma la tshong dpon gyi chung margyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas bud med lnga brgya dang bcas pa gser gyis gang ba'i sder mchen po thogs nas byer 'thon to// thams cad byin nas tshong dpon rang nyid gos
263a3: bzang po gyon no/ / de bzhin du gos bzang po gyon pa'i tshong dpon lnga brgya dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis drung du song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor dge bsnyen 'di rnams mdun du byas nas
263a4: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po rnams 'khor du byas te/ rang nyid kyi sku lus kyi 'od kyis gser gyi bcud kyi gong bu lta bu dang mtshungs pa dang / nags tshal gyi bar du snang bar mdzad cing mtha' yas
263a5: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rol pa sangs rgyas kyi dpal zla med cing mtshungs pa med pa rgyal byed tshal gyi nang du byon no/ / de nas mgon med zas sbyin gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa gtsug lag
263a6: khang 'di ji lta bu la dbul bar bgyi/ khyim bdag gtsug lag khang 'di 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul cig/ legs so bcom ldan 'das zhes

263b1: t shong dpon chen pos gser gyi ril pa spyi blugs bslangs nas stobs bcu pa'i phyag rngu chu bsgrengs te rgyal byed tshal gyi gtsug lag khang 'di 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i phyogs bzhi'i sangs rgyas la sogs
263b2: pa'i dge 'dun la sbyin zhes phul lo/ / ston pas gtsug lag khang pa zhes nas rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do// grang dang dro bas mi nyams shing // de ltar ri dgas la sogs pa'i
263b3: sdig sAl dang ni sbrang bu dang / / ba mo dang ni char pas so// de ltar rlung dang shin du gros sor lus lags pa dang // khang nang gnas pa bde ba skyes// khang par bsam gtan lhag mthong rnams//
263b4: dge 'dren gtsug lag khang 'bul ba// sangs rgyas mchog gi bsngags par mdzad// skyes bu mkhas pas de'i phyir// bdag nyid kyi ni phyir du ni// dga' bas gtsug lag
263b5: khang byed pa/ / mang du thos pa gnas pa yin// de rnams kyi ni bza' dang btung // gos dang mal cha stan dang ni// de rnams sems ni drang por 'bul// rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis so// des ni de la chos bstan to// sdug bsngal
263b6: thams cad nyer ni 'phyir/ / gang de'i chos ni rtogs pa dang // rten med mya ngan 'das par byed ces bya ba'i gtsug lag khang gi phan yon bshad do// mgon med zas sbyin gyis/

264a1: nyi ma gnyis pa nas bzung nas sbyin pa gtong ba'i mgo brtsams so// sa khams byas pa'i khang bzang ni zla ba bzhis grub po// slar yang mgod med zas sbyin gyi gtsug lag khang chen po zla ba dgus grub po// gtsug
264a2: lag khang chen po la yang bye ba stong phrag bcu brgyad nyid song ngo / / 'di la gtsug lag khang chen po 'di nyid la bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bzhi'i nor yongs su btang ngo // slar yang 'das pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi
264a3: dus su tshong dpon kun gyi grogs zhes bya bas gser gyi glang po'i rkang pa'i rmig rjes lta bu'i sa gzhi nyes nas/ / gnas 'di nyid du dpag tshad gcig gi dge 'dun gyi kun dka' ra ba byas so// bcom ldan 'das gtsug tang
264a4: can gyi dus su/ dpal 'phel zhes bya ba'i tshong dben gyi bus gser gyi sder ma rgyun mi 'chad pas nyos pa'i sa gzhi'i gnas de nyid du rgyang grags bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam gyi dge 'dun gyis kun dga' ra ba byas so//
264a5: bcom ldan 'das thams cad stob kyi dus su mong dben pas shis zhes bya bas gser gyis gzhi gser gyi rkang pa'i rjes lta ba'i sa gzhinyis na ga nyid dpag cad byed kyi dge 'dun gyi kun dka' ba byas so//
264a6: bcom ldan 'das lag pa dang sel gyi dus su chad dpon 'thob med pa zhes bya bas gas kyi pa kra a ldan ma 'chad pa'i sa gzhi nyis nas gnas nyid du rgyad grags pa'i tshad kyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' brtsams
264a7: sa sa dag / sa ldan pa sa
264a8: ldan 'das 'od srung gi dus su tshong dpon pakra shis bzang ba zhes bya bas gser gyi bgu sbyin mi 'chad blta bu'i sa gzhinyis nas gnas de nyid du rgya dgrags gcig gi da kyi da da/ rab byam po// mA yang

264b1: b dag cag gi bcom ldan 'das kyi dus su tshong dpon mgon med zas sbyin gyis bye ba phrag bcwa brgyad kyi dbyig gis gser gyi 'dra men du byas pa rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bus sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags phyed
264b2: kyi kun dga' ra ba byas so/ / gnas 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma spangs pa'i gnas yin no// 'di ltar byang chub chen po'i snying po'i drung du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa ji srid pa nas yongs su mya ngan las
264b3: 'das pa'i mthar thug pa de srid du gang dang gang gi gnas su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa 'di ni nye ba'i glang gzhi zhes bya'o/ / de'i lugs kyis skyes rabs thams cad du bsngags par mdzad do// skyes pa rabs kyi
264b4: gzha' bshad pa rdzogs so/ / @#// rgya gar skad du/ AT+TA nA nI ya sU tra/ bod skad du/ lcang 'dzin brang gi mdo// 'phags pa dkon mcho ga gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
264b5: zas padus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i kha byin dpung ba ril btsugs so// de nas rgyal ba chen pa bzhi pagan sbyin mang bar rje dang / de ba yang ba'i cwo dang thus thum kyi snga mang po dang klu'i sde mang ba rnams phyogs
264b6: bzhi bsku shing gnas so/ / phyogs bzhir mtshan can du gnas so// phyogs pani skyob cing gnas so// mtshan po 'ongs te kha dog sna tshogs pa can gyis bya nod phreng po'i ri 'ab 'azhig sdang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
264b7: gas padi mau sa com ldan nasas rgyag byas nas kyig ga tul / / nad byid rnams la sa ga lalas bcos ldan 'das la rtsag byas nas phyogs gcig tu me da//
264b8: la btsun gsol te bsnyun gsol nas de ltar snying po dang snying po med pa'i gtam 'dri zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dzad do//

265a1: gang su dag gis mi dang gis pod cing byenas cig tu 'khod do// gang su dag cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan
265a2: 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gnod sbyin ma rungs pa gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to// gnod sbyin ma rungs pa gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to// gnod sbyin 'bring ba
265a3: gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to/ / gnod sbyin 'bring po gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to// gnod sbyin dman pa gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
265a4: la ma dad par 'gyur to/ / gnod sbyin dman pa gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to// gnod sbyin gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma dad par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/ btsun pa bcom
265a5: ldan 'das kyis srog gcod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / ma byin par len pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / 'dod pa log par spyod pa spongs pa'i chos bstan pa dang / brdzun du smra ba spang ba'i chos bstan pa dang
265a6: mos par 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung bsrung ba'i chos bstan pa mdzad la/ / gnod sbyin gang de rnams sreg gcod pa spong ba la mi dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / ma byin par lan pa spong bal me dga' bar blang ba dang / 'dod pa na
265a7: spyod pa rgyang ba la mi dga' bar byung pa dang / brtan du sgru ba snang ba ma 'bar 'gyung ba dang / rgyas par 'gyur ba'i mang shi nga bsnang bal ba dag bang byu ba med rnams la ma dga' nang pa 'ad pa
265a8: tu ban ma ldan nam kyas na thamang da mad pa rnams 'thag nan pa'i lam du thags nas nyal ba dang 'ag pa la gan/ / med ca kyas mad par dan pa gnas shing su 'dzi 'tsha ba /

265b1: so sor dge sbyong rnams 'thun par gnas so// de na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa rnams kyi gnas yod do// gang zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab lam dad par gyur te/ de rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir btsun pa
265b2: bcom ldan 'das la bslab par bya ste/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrung du gsol// dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/ dge snyen nam dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang 'tshe ba med pa dang bde ba dang legs
265b3: par gnas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung ba'i tshul gyis gnang ngo // de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba shes te/ de'i tshe 'di ltar lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig/
265b4: ces gsol to// spyan ldan dpal dang ldan pa yi// rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'byung po rnams la brtse ba yi/ gtsug tor can la'ang phyag 'tshal lo// mgon med rnams la gdung ba yi// thams cad skyob la
265b5: phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdud kyi sde rnams 'doms pa yi/ 'khor ba 'jigs la phyag 'tshal lo// bram ze dpal dang ldan pa yin// gser thub la ni phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnam grol mdzad pa yi// 'od srung la ni phyag
265b6: 'tshal lo/ / shAkya'i sras ni dpal dang ldan// nyi ma'i rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo// sdug bsngal kun las sgrol mdzad pa// gang zhig chos ni rab ston mdzad// gang yang 'jig rten par 'gyur pa// ji lta ba bzhin gzigs
265b7: gyung ba'i/ / de rnams la ni za ma med// 'jigs pa med pa chen po'o// gang zhig gau ta ma phyag byed pa// lha dang mi la phan pa yin// rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan// 'jigs pa med pa chen po ste// nyi ma da kyil
265b8: 'khor chen po ni/ / gang zhig tu ni nub cing 'char// gang du nyi ma nub gyur ba// de ni mtshan mor 'gyur ba yin// gang du nyi ma shar gyur pa// de ni nyin mo zhes brjod do// gting ni zab pa'i rgya mtsho ye// de yi chu yi bcud bzang ngo // de ltar der ni skyes

266a1: gyur pa/ / rgyamathar rtsimi ba cung bzhin no// 'dir ni shar gyi phyogs kyin// skye ba rnams la 'du brjod de// de ma phyogs na kun stong ba'o// rgyal ba chen po grags chen lnga// dri tha rnams kyi bdag za/
266a2: ming ni rgyal po yul 'khor skyod// dri za 'khor dang bcas pa ni// klu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed// de yi bu ni mang po rnams// ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan// de ni dgu bcwa
266a3: gcig go/ / de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni/ 'jigs dang bral ba chen po la// thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o// skyes ba cad mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal// skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal
266a4: lo/ / dge brtag tu gsung ba la// mi ma yin rnams khyod phyag 'tshal// rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o// de phyir de ltar 'di brjod de// rgyal ba go tam phyag gyis shig/ rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do// rigs pa dang ni zhabs
266a5: su ldan/ / sangs rgyas go ta ma phyag 'tshal lo// gang yang yi dgas rjod byed pa// tham rgyab kyi sha can dang // srog gcod pa la chags pa dang // skye bo ma lus 'joms pa'o// 'dir ni sgo yi phyogs gnas pad+ma/
266a6: skye bo rnams la 'di skad brjod// de yi gnas ni yongs sbyor ba// rgyal po chen po zags ldan pa// grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya// grul bum 'khor dang bcas pa ni// glu dang gar gyis
266a7: dga' bar byed/ / de yi bu ni mang po rnams// ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan// de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / nyi ma'i rgyud kyis sangs rgyas ni// rigs
266a8: dang bral ba chen po la/ / thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o// skyes bu cad mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal// skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dge brtag tu gsung ba la// mi ma yin rnams khyod phyag 'tshal// rtag tu 'di ni nyan par

266b1: dephyir de ltar 'di brjod de/ rgyal ba go tam phyag gyis shig/ rgyal ba go tam phyag bgyid do// rig pa dang ni zhab su ldan/ sangs rgyas go ta ma phyag 'tshal lo// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ gang nas
266b2: gang du shar gyur pa/ / der ni nyin mor 'gyur ba ste// nyin mo zhes ni brjod pa yin// gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa// de ni mtshan mor brjod par byed// gting ni zab pa'i rgya mtsho yi// de yi chu ni bcud bzad do// de ltar der ni skyes gyur
266b3: pa'i/ / rgya mche'i chu yi bcud bzhin no// 'dir ni nub kyi rdzogs kyi ni// skye bo rnams la 'di brjod de// de yi phyogs ni kun skyong ba'i// rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan// klu rnams kyi ni bdag po ste/ 'ad yi ming ni mig ma par
266b4: klu li 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ / klung gar gyis dga' bar byed// de yi Ta ni mang po rnams// ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go// de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /
266b5: nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni// jigs dang thal ba chen po la// thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o// skyes ba cang mkhyen khye phyag 'tshal// skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dge ba rtag tu gsung bal// mi ma yin rnams byed
266b6: phyag 'tshal/ rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o// de phyir de ltar 'di brjodade// rgyal bgo tam phyag gyis shig/ rgyal bgo tam phyag bgyid do// rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan// sangs rgyas go tam phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig byang phyogs
266b7: sgra ma snyan/ / lhun po blta na sdug ri dga'// der skyes pa yi mi rnams ni// bdag gir yongs su bzung ba med// de rnams sa bon 'debs pa med// rmo ba yang ni med pa yin// dka' spyad med par 'bras smin 'i
266b8: mi rnams yongs su longs spyad do/ / spun med ma grugs shin tu dag/ dri bzang 'bras ni 'bras bu ldan// 'bras kyi 'o ma la 'tshod cing // de bzhin bcos nas longs spyod do// ba lang rkang gcig la zhon nas// yul dang phyogs

267a1: su 'gro bar byed/ / da pa gcig pa'i phyugs zhon nas// yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed// bud med kyi ni bzhon pa la// zhon nas yul dang phyogs su 'gro// skyes bu'i bzhon pa la zhon nas// yul dang phyogs su 'aH/
267a2: bar byed// gzhon ma yi gzhon pa la// zhon nas yul dang phyogs su 'gro// gzhon nu'i bzhon pa la zhon nas// yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed// gzhon pa de rnams la zhon nas// phyogs kun tu ni rjes su 'gro//
267a3: gtso bo rgyal po khyad med do// glang chen bzhon dang rta yi bzho// lha'i bzhon pa la gnas nas// khang bzang dang ni khyogs dang ni// rgyal po chen po grags dang ldan// de'i yang grub pa'i grong khyer ni// dri med par snang la/
267a4: gnas pa// lcang lo can dang ku shI grong // pha rol ku sha'i grong dang ni// nA Ta'i grong dang pha rol gyi// ku shi ta'i grong yin no// byang gi phyogs na thams cad rgyas// skye bo'i tshogs pa mang po gnas// dgu bcu rtsa dgu
267a5: thong mkha' la/ / rgyal po'i pho brang ljang lo can// slar yang drang srong chen po dang // rgyal po chen po lus ngan po// bi sA NA zhes pa rgyal po'i pho brang ngo // de'i phyir rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / lus ngan po zhes
267a6: brjod do/ / so so do rab tu gsal zhing zhi ba dang de dang der ni de dang de mdangs dang de'i gzi brjid dang dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal po stobs dang ldan pa'i ming ngo // sa gzhi yang ni bcud ldan no// gnas der sprin
267a7: rnams char 'bebs par byed do/ / der ni b+ha ga la ba tI zhes pa'i rdzing bu'o// gang du gnos sbyin tshogs dang cig tu gnas so// der ni rtag tu shing gi 'bras// sna tshogs bya rnams lhan cig gnas// rma bya khrung khrung sgra
267a8: sgrogs shing / / khwa byug rnams ni tshan tshan gnas// shang shang te'u sgra sgrogs shing // de nas yang mi rung ba dang // gong mo nags kyi bya dag ni// nags kyi rdzing bur gnas pa'o// ne tsher skyegs de sgra 'byin//

267b1: de Na ta mA Na bya dkar ni/ dus kun du ni mdzes par byed// lus ngan rgyal po'i rdzing rtag mdzes// 'di ni byang gi phyogs kyi yul// skyes po rnams ni 'di bzhin brjod// de yi phyogs ni yongs spong ba'i// rgyal po chen po/
267b2: grags dang ldan// gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po ste/ 'di yi ming ni lus ngan po// gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa ni// glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed// de yi bu ni mang po rnams// ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste//
267b3: dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan// de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas mi/ 'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/ thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o// skyes bu cad
267b4: mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/ / skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dge ba rtag tu gsungs pa la// mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal// rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o// de phyir de ltar 'di brjod de/ rgyal ba gau tam phyag
267b5: gyis shig/ rgyal ba gau ta ma phyag bgyid do// rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ sangs rgyas gau ta ma phyag 'tshal lo// 'dir ni drang srong chen pos lcang lo can gyi pho brang dang bcas pas bsrung shig/ de da ma dge slong
267b6: ma'am dge bsnyen nam dge snyen ma rnams la srung ba dang / sba ba dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / bde ba dang legs par gnas so// drang srong chen po dang su dag dge slong dang bcas pa 'am dge slong ma
267b7: dang bcas pa'am dge snyen dang bcas pa'am dge snyen ma dang bcas pa rnams la/ 'dir lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis de bsrung ba dang yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad yid la zung cig/ de'i yang mi ma yin
267b8: rnams so/ / gnod sbyin nam gnod sbyin mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi bu zo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen po 'am gnod sbyin gyi 'khor ram gnod sbyin gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ dri za pho

268a1: 'am drib mo'am rba ba'i bu po 'am ma tha' bra mo 'am dra ba 'thon pa chen po'amatsho ba'i 'khor ra ma za' g.yog 'khang ram/ / bral bram po 'am thul bum ma'am grul bum gyi cu pa'am thul bum gyi
268a2: mo'o'am gul bum gyi blon po chen po 'am gral bum gyi 'khor ram thul bram gyi g.yog 'khor ngam/ / thu bo'imaklu mo'amathu'i phra po 'amathu'i bu mo 'amaklu'i blon po 'am klu'i 'khor ngam k+Sha'i g.yog 'khor ngam/
268a3: rab tu snang ba'i sems kyis 'gro'am rjes su 'tho'amadzes su 'gro ba dang sdong pa dang lhan cig tu sdong pa dang / gnas pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa dang / nyal ba dang sbyin cig tu nyal ba rnams ni drang mong chen pa
268a4: 'di rnams ni ma ma yin zhes bya'o/ / zong ngam thong rdal lam bkur sti pa'am sti stang du byed pa la drang song chen po ma ma yin rnams kyis de thob pa ma yin no// rgyal po'i phozang lcang lo can zhes bya ba la gzhi 'am
268a5: gnas med de/ / drang srong chen po mim yin rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis lhan cig tu gnas pa'ang mi 'thob bo// drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi man rnams kyi bka' mnyan par bya'o// drang srong chen po gzhan yang ma
268a6: ma yin rnams kyis bdag la phan pa rdzogs pa dang / pha rol la smod pa dang / cod pa dang / drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams la snod mer rab tu 'bar ba mgo la bkon pa dang / drang srong chen po
268a7: gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyi mgo bo tshal ba bdun du gshegs par byed do/ / drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin ni gtum pa dang drag pa dang khro ba'o// de rnams kyis 'di ltar rgyal po chen po la rjod par byed/
268a8: ro// rgyal po la rjod par ma nus na skyes bu la sogs pa la rjod par byed do// rgyal po'i skyes bu la rjod par ma nus na de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu rnams la rjod par byed do// drang srong chen po de yang mi ma yin rnams rgyal po

268b1: chen po la 'gal ba smra ba'o/ / drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/ ma ga d+ha'i yul gyi rgyal po la chom rkun byung na de ma thag tu rgyal po la rjod par byed do// rgyal po la brjod par ma nus na rgyal po'i skyes bu la rjod par byed//
268b2: skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la rjod par byed pa bzhin no// drang srong chen po de yang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po la chom kun gyis gnod pa byed par rjod do// drang srong chen po 'di lta bum ma yin yod pa rnams
268b3: gtum pa dang drag pa dang khro ba'o/ / de ma thag tu rgyal po chen po rnams la rjod par byed do// rgyal po chen po la brjod par ma nus na rgyal po'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do// skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na de'i 'og ma'i skyes/
268b4: bul rjod par byed do// drang srong chen po de ni mi ma yin rnams rgyal po chen po rnams la 'gal bar rjod par byedado// drang srong chen po mi ma yin gang zhig gnod sbyin po'am gnod sbyin mo'am gnod sbyin gyi bu'am gnod
268b5: sbyin gyi bu mo'am gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen pa'am gnod sbyin gyis 'khor ram gnod sbyin gyi gamog 'khor ram/ thib po'amachi za mo'amachi ba'i bu pa'am dri ba'i bu mo'am za'i blon po chen po'amadze ze'i 'khor ma
268b6: dri ba'i gamag 'khar ram/ / bral bum po'am thul bum mo'am thul bram gyi ba po'am thal bram gyi bla mo'am thal bram mi blon po chen po'am thul bum kyi 'khor ram thul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ klu bo'amathu mo'am
268b7: 'i thu bo 'amatha'i bu mo'am thu ston pa shes sun par ma klu'i g.yog 'ayong dam/ rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis dge slong dam dge/ slong ma'am dge bsnyen nam dge sbyin ma rnams 'gro ba'am rjes su tshas
268b8: dzang sdod pa dang lhan cig tu rjong ba dang / gnas pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa dang / nyal ba dang lhan cig tu nyal ba dang / 'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sde dpon rnams

269a1: dang sde dpon chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang / nga ro sngags par byed pa dang / sgra cher sgrogs par byed pa'o// 'dir gnod kyis gzung nas gnad sbyin 'dir che 'breg par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin
269a2: 'dis 'tshe bar byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par tho 'tsham par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis ni mi gtong bar byed
269a3: doganod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sde dpon rnams dang sde dpon chen pos rnams gang zhen/ dbang po zla ba chung zla dang // b+hu dra dza skye dbu'i bdag/ tsan dan dang 'od mchog dang / mgul ba mdzes dang mthal
269a4: des dang / skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang / lha las byung ba'i kha lo ba/ dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// mi rgyal rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang // de bzhin ri dang gangs can dang / gang ba smin drag phug dang ni/ 'tsho ba dang ni btang gardza
269a5: dang / / sna tshogs bshes gnyen gnya' shing 'dzin// sa skyong rab tu rtogs pa dang // ngo tsha mig dang khang pa dang / lnga le na gtum po A la bka/ srid slab yid bzang bzhin bzang dang / zhog dong nor bu nor bu spyod// de bzhin
269a6: dbang phyug dang bcas so/ / 'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sde dpon rnams dang sde dpon chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang / nga ro sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgra cher
269a7: sgrogs par byed pa'o/ / 'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas gnod sbyin 'dis tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis 'tshe bar byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par tho 'tsham par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis
269a8: gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis ni mi gtong bar byed do// drang srong chen po 'dis ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrungs shig dge slong dang dge slong ma dang

269b1: dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / bde ba dang legs par gnas so// drang srong chen po de ni bdag cag rnams 'gro bar bgyi'o// bdag cag rnams ni bya ba mang ba dang byed pa mang bso so
269b2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ / rgyal po chen po khyod rnams de ni 'gro bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po zhi po rnams langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba byas nas der me snang bar gyur to// gnod
269b3: sbyin de rnams kyang langs nas gar su dag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ / gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das la spyan gsol te bsnyun gsol nas snying po dang snying pa med
269b4: paji ltar shes la de rnams de nyid du ma snang bar gyur to/ / gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das gal ba der thal ma sbyar nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// gang la la zhig gis ming dang rigs rnam par dpyad nas de nyid dum
269b5: bar gyur to/ / gang la la zhig car mi smra bar gyur te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// ljang lo can gyi pho brang gi mdo las skabs rab mchog dang po'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i mtshan mo 'ongs nas dge slong rnams pas
269b6: nanas dge slong dag 'di'i mtshan me rgyal po chen po bzhi pa rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams dang dri za'i sde mang po dang / grul bum gyi sde mang po dang / klu'i sde mang po dang phyogs bzhi bsrung zhing gnas so// lcags
269b7: bani tshan tshan du gnas pa/ phyags bzhi stong zhing gnas so// mtshan mo 'ongs te kha dog sna tshogs pa can gyis bya rgod phung po'i ri 'ba' zhig snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song nas ngal phyag byas nas phyags/
269b8: gcig tu 'khod do// dge slong dag dang gnod sbyin de rnams gang lal zhig gis ngal phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gang su dag gis ngal bsnyun gsol ste bsnyun gsol nas ji ltar snying po dang snying po med pa'i gtam

270a1: 'di zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / gang su dag gis de la thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gang su dag gis ming dang rigs dpyod cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gang su dag cang mi smra bar phyogs
270a2: gcig tu 'khod do/ / phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas dge slong dag dang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus nga la 'di skad ces gsol nas/ gnod sbyini ma rungs pa yod pa rnams gangal la btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par 'gyur ba rnams
270a3: gnod sbyin ma rung ba gangal la zhig yon nyan 'das la dad par gyur to/ / gnod sbyin 'bring po gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la mdad par 'gyur to// gnod sbyin 'bring po gang la la zhig ba can pa bcom ldan 'das la la dang /
270a4: bar gyur to// gnod sbyin dman pa gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to// gnod sbyin dman pa gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to// gnod sbyin gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom
270a5: ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis srog gcod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / ma byin par len pa spong ba'i chos ston pa dang / 'dod par log par spyod pa spong ba'i chos bstan
270a6: pa dang / brdzun du smra ba spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba spong ba'i chos bstan pas so// gnod sbyin gang de rnams btsun pas srog gcod pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang / ma byin par
270a7: len pa spong ba la mi dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dod pa log par spyod pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang / brdzun du smra ba spong ba lami dga' bar gyur pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba spong ba la ma dga' bar
270a8: gyur pas so/ / de rnams la mi dga' zhing mi 'dod par gyur to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos ji snyed yod pa rnams 'brog dgon pa'i lam du zhugs nas nyal ba dang 'dug pa dang brten to// sgra med cing dbyangs

270b1: med par dben par gnas shing 'du 'dzi'i 'tshe ba med de/ / so sor dge sbyong rnams 'thun zhing gnas so// de na gnod sbyin ma rung ba rnams kyi gnas yod do// gang zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la ma dad par
270b2: gyur to/ / de rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bslab par bya ste/ lcang lo can gyi po zang gis bsrung du gsol/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung
270b3: ba dang / sra ba dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / bde ba dang legs par gnas so// dge slong rnams la bdag gis cang mi gsung ba'i tshul gyis gnang ba byin no// de nas rgyal ba chen po rnam thos kyi bus gnang ba byin pa
270b4: shes te/ de'i tshe 'di ltar lca lo can gyi po zang gis srungs shig ces gsol to// spyan ldan dpal dang ldan pa yi// rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnams la brtse ba yi// gtsug tor can la phyag
270b5: 'tshal lo/ / mgon med rnams la gdung ba yi// thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo// bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms pa yi// 'khor ba 'jigs la phyag 'tshal lo// bram ze dpal dang ldan pa yi/ gser thu ba la yang
270b6: phyag 'tshal lo/ / sems can rnam grol mdzad pa yi// 'od srung la ni phyag 'tshal lo// shAkya'i sras ni dpal dang ldan// nyi ma'i rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo// sdug bsngal kun las grol mdzad pa'i// gang zhig chos ni
270b7: rab bston mdzad/ / gang yang 'jig rten par gyur pa// ji lta ba bzhin gzigs gyur pa'i// de rnams la ni phra ma med/ 'jigs pa med pa chen po ni// gang shig gau tam byab byed pa// lha dang mi la phan pa'i yin//
270b8: rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan// 'jig pa med pa chen po ste// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni// gang zhig nyi ma nub cing 'char// gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa// dar ni mtshan mor 'gyur ba yin// gang du nyi ma shar gyur pa/

271a1: dan ldan ma nas du/ / ya // das na rgyas myu bal// sa 'ju na// 'dan ga ts+tshags// sa
271a2: 'di brjod do/ / de yi phyogs ni yongs spyod pa'i// rgyal ba chen po zags chen ldan// dri za rnams kyi bdag po ste// ming ni rgyal po yul 'khor skyong // dri za 'khor dang bcas pan// klu dang gar gyis dga' bar
271a3: byed/ / de yi bu ni mang po rnams// mi ngan gcig tu thos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan// de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni// 'jigs
271a4: dang bral ba chen po la/ / thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o// skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal// skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dge ba rtag tu gsu ba la/ mi ma yin rnams khyod phyag 'tshal// rtag tu 'di ni
271a5: nyan pa'o/ / de phyir de ltar 'di brjod do// rgyal ba gau ta ma phyag gyis shig/ rgyal bgo ta ma phyog bgyid do// rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan// rgyal ba gau tam phyag 'tshal lo// gang yang yi dgas rjod byed pa/
271a6: phram rgyab kyi sha can dang // srog gcod pal chags pa dang // skye bo ma lus 'joms pa'o// 'dir ni lho yi phyogs gnas pa'i// skye bo rnams la 'di skad brjod// de yi gnas ni yongs skyong ba// rgyal po
271a7: chen po grags ldan pa/ grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya// grul bum 'khor dang bcas pa ni// glu da dkar gyis dga' bar byed// de yi brin mang po rnams// ming ni gcig tu
271a8: thos pa ste/ / dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go// de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // nyi ma'i rgyud kyi sangs rgyas ni// 'jigs dang bral ba chen po la// thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o//

271b1: sa ba cang mabyen bya byaga'ajal// skyes bum chog khyad pag 'jal la// ge banag zugs ba la// bam ldan nams byed pag la// / nga/ 9 / rgya
271b2: gau tam phyag bgyid do/ / rigs pa dang ni zhabs su ldan// sangs rgyas gau ta ma phyag 'tshal lo// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni// gang nas gang du shar gyur pa// der ni nyin mor 'gyur ba ste// nyin mo zhes
271b3: ni brjod pa yin/ / gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa// der ni mtshan mar rjod par byed// gting ni zab pa'i rgya mtsho yi// de yi chu yi bcud bzang ngo // de ltar der ni skyes gyur pa'i// rgya mtsho'i chu yi bcud bzhin no// 'dir ni nub
271b4: kye phyogs kyi ni/ / skye bo rnams la 'di brjod do// de nis phyogs kun skyong ba'i// rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan// klu rnams kyi ni bdag po ste// 'di yi ming ni mig mi bzang // klu yi 'khor dang bcas pa ni// klu dang /
271b5: gar gyis dga' bor byed// de yi bu ni mang po rnams// med ni gcig tu thos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan// de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ de dag sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // nyi ma'i gnyen gyi
271b6: sangs rgyas ni/ / 'jigs dang bral ba chen po la// thag ring nas ni phyag bgyid do// skyes bu cad mkhyen khyod phyag 'tshal// skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la// mim
271b7: yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/ / rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o// de phyir de ltar 'di brjod do// rgyal po gau tam phyag gyis shig/ rgyal ba gau ta ma phyag bgyid do// rigs pa dang ni zhabs su ldan// sangs
271b8: rgyas go tam phyag 'tshal lo/ / gang zhig byang phyogs sgra me snyan// lhun po blta na sdug ri dag 'dir skyes pa yi mi rnams ni// bdag gir yongs su bzung ba med// de rnams sa bon 'debs pa med// rmo ba yang ni med yin//

272a1: dka' spyad med par 'bras sman na// se rnams yangs su langs spyad da// spun mdam thugs shin dud// ji bzad 'bras ni 'bras par ldan// 'bras 'amala'ang cang // sa nas dang/
272a2: rgyudado// ba lang gang gcig la zhan nas// yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed// rkang pa gcig pa'i phyugs zhan nas// yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed// bud med kyi ni bkon pa la// zhonanas yul dang lcags su 'gro/
272a3: skyes pa'i bzhon pa la zhon nas// yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed// gzhon nu ma yi bzhon pa la// zhon nas yul dang phyogs su 'gro gzhon nu'i bzhin pa la zhon nas// yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ bzhan pa de
272a4: rnams la zhan nas/ / phyogs kun du ni rjes su 'gro// gtso bo rgyal po khyad med do// glang chen bzhon dang rta yi bzhin// wA yi bzhon pa la gnas nas// khang bzang dang ni khyogs rnams ni// rgyal po chen pa grags chen
272a5: ldan/ / de'i yang grub pa'i grong khyer ni// dri med par snang la gnas pa// lung la can dang bu sha'i grong // pha rol kun sha'i grong dang ni// nA TA'i grong dang pha rol gyi// ku shi ta'i grong yin na// byang gi phyogs na thams cad
272a6: rgyas/ / skye bo'i tshogs pa mang po gnas// dgu bcwa rtsa dgu zong mkha' la// rgyal ba 'pho tha dacad lo can// slar yang drang srong chen po dang // rgyal ba chen po lus ngan ga/ cog ldan zhes pargyal po chen po'i pha brang /
272a7: dang phyir rgyal ba rnam zas kyi bu dang lus ngan pa zhes brjod do// sa sar rab tu gsal zhing zhi ba dang de dang der ni de dang da mdangs dang de'i gzi da dab nas dang ldan pa'i rnabs dang ldan pa'i rgyal
272a8: stabs dang ldan pa'i mang ngo / / sa gzhi yang ni bcud ldan no// gnas der sprin rnams char 'bebs par byed do// deng ni b+hag la ba tI zhes pa'i ji bu'o// gang du gnod sbyin tshags dang lhan cig tu gnas sa//

272b1: na / nas / mas sa// can na / / sa rdzu / rdzun
272b2: phyagag rnams/ / nags kyi rdzing bar gnas pa'o// ne tsher skyegs de sgra 'byin// daM/ Ta mAn bya dkar dang / dus kun d+ha ni mdzes par byed// lus ngan rgyal ba'i rjing rtag mdzeg/ 'di ni byang gi phyogs kyi yul skyes
272b3: rnams ni 'di bzhin brjod/ / de yi phyogs ni yongs spyod ba'i// rgyal po chen po grogs dang ldan// gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag pa ste// 'di yi ming ni lus ngan po// gnad sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa ni// glu dang gar gyis dga' bar
272b4: byed/ / de yi bu ni mang po rnams// ma ni gcig tu thos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan// de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni/ 'jigs dang bral ba chen po la// thag ring
272b5: nas ni phyag bgye'o/ / skyes bu cang mkhyen byed phyag 'tshal// skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal la// dge ba rtag tu gsungs pa la// mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal// rtag tu 'di ni nyon pa'o// dpyir de ltar 'di brjod de// rgyal ba gtam/
272b6: phyag kyis shig/ rgyal ba gtam phyag bgyid de// rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan// sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo// 'dir ni drang srong chen po srung la can dang bcas pas bsrung shig/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam
272b7: dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrungs pa dang / sba ba dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / bde ba dang legs par gnas so// drang srong chen po gang su dag dge slong dang bcas pa'am dge slong ma dang bcas pa'am/ dge stan dang bcas pa
272b8: 'am dge snyed ma dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'dir lung la can gyi po thang gis de srung ba dang / yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad yongs su zung shig/ de yang mi ma yin rnams so// gnod sbyin nam gnod sbyin ma'am gnang sbyin

273a1: bu po'am gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen po 'am gnod sbyin gyi 'khor ram gnod sbyin gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ / dri za bo'am dri za bo'am dri za'i bu bo 'am dri ba'i bu po'am dri za'i blod pa chen po'am
273a2: dri zi'i 'khor rab dri zi'i g.yog 'khor ram/ grul bram po'amagul bum mo 'am phrul bul gyi bu bo'am grul bul gyi'u me 'o ma grul bum gyi blon po chen po 'am grul bum gyi 'khor ram grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ klu po
273a3: 'am klu mo 'am klu'i bu bo 'am klu'i bu mo 'am klu'i blon pochen mo 'am klu'i 'khor ram klu'i g.yog 'khor rnams rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis 'gro ba 'am rjes su 'gro ba'am rjes su 'gro ba dang / / sdod pa dang lhan cig tu sdod pa dang /
273a4: gnas pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa dang / nyal ba dang lhan cig tu nyal ba rnams la/ drang srong chen po 'di rnams ni mi ma yin rnams zhes bya'o// grong ngam grong rdal lam/ bkur bstir byed pa'am sti stang du byed pa rnams
273a5: drang srong chen po mi ma yin rnams kyis de thob pa ma yin no/ / rgyal po chen po'i pho brang lca nga lo can zhes bya ba gzhi 'am gnas su med do// drang srong chen po mi ma yin nams kyis gnod sbyin dang lhan cig tu gnas pa'ang mi long
273a6: bo drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin nams kyi bka' mnyan par bya'o/ / drang srong chen po gzhan yang si ma yin rnams kyis bdag la phan pa rdzogs pa dang / pha rol la spod pa dang / cod pa dang / drang srong chen po gzhan
273a7: yang mi ma yin/ / rnams la snod mer rab tu 'bar ba mgo la bkon pa dang / drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyis mgo bo tshol ba bdun du gshegs par byed do// drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin ni gtum pa
273a8: dang drag pa dang khro ba'o/ de rnams kyis 'di ltar rgyal po chen po la rjod par byed do// rgyal po chen po la brjod par mi nus na skyes bu la sogs pa la rjod par byed do// rgyal po chen po'i skyes bral brjod par mi nus na de

273b1: sa sgrus thal nga par byed pa/ / mang can pad yang mam ldan rnams rgyal bal 'azhal bsgram / na pa 'dags// lag las rgyal ba la ma nan na sa klu rgyal da/
273b2: rgyal ba ladzad par mnu pan rgyal ba'i skyes bu la dzad par byed do// skyes bra la brjod par man na// da'i 'ag ra'i skyes bral drang par byed pa pazhinano// dang brang can pa yang mag d+ha'i rgyal ba la tsha ba kun gyis ga
273b3: byed par dzad do/ / drang srong chen po 'ang lta bu'i mim yin rnams gtum pa dang drug pa dang khro ba'o// de ma thag tu rgyal ba chen po rnams larjod par byed do// rgyal po chen pa la brjod par sa dus na rgyal po'i skyes bral brjod pa
273b4: byed do/ / skyes bral brjed par ma rusan de'i 'og pa'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do// drang gro chen po mi ma yin napas rgyal po chen po rnams la 'gal brjod par byed do// nga pra napa mi yi gang zhig gdod sbyin nam
273b5: gnod sbyin mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi bu 'am gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen sa no sbyin gyi 'khor ram gnod sbyin byig yog 'khor ma/ dri za pho'am dri za mo 'am dri za'i bu po'am dri za'i bu mo 'am dri za'i blon po chen po'am
273b6: dri zi'i 'khor ram dri za'i g.yog 'khor ram/ grul bum po 'am grul bum mo'am grul bu gyi bu po'am grul bum gyi bu mo 'am grul bum gyi blon po chen po'am grul bum gyi 'khor ram grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/
273b7: klu po 'am klu ma 'am klu'i bu po'am klu'i bu mo'am chu'i blon po chen po'am klu'i 'khor ram klu'i g.yog 'khor rnams rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am// dge bsnyed nam dge bsnyen ma rnams 'gro ba'am
273b8: rjes su 'gro ba 'am rjes su 'gro ba dang / sdod pa dang lhan cig tu sdod pa dang nyal ba dang lhan cig tu nyal ba dang / 'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang // sde dporan rnams dang / sde dpon

274a1: chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang / ngare sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgra cher sgrogs par byed pa'o// 'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas gnod sbyin 'dis tshe 'phrogs par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin
274a2: 'dir 'tshe bar byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par tho 'tsham par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis mi gtong bar byed do//
274a3: gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sde dpon rnams dang / sde dpon chen po rnams gang zhe na/ dbang po zla ba chu zla ba// b+hA ra dA dza skye dgu'i bdag/ tsan dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang // mgul pa
274a4: mdzes dang mgul nges dang / / skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang // lha las byung ba'i kha lo ba// dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// mi rgyal rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang // de bzhin ri dang gangs can dang // gang ba sbyin drug phug
274a5: dang ni/ / 'tshe ba dang ni btang bzung dang // sna tshogs gshegs gnyen gnya' shing 'dzin// sa skyongs rab tu rtogs pa dang // ngo tsha mig dang khang pa dang // lnga len gtum po A la ba ga/ srid sgrub yid bzang bzhin
274a6: bzang dang / / zhog dong nor bu nor bu spyod// de bzhin dbang phyug dang bcas so// 'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sded nanam dang sbed pon chen po rnam pa gsos par byed pa dang / nga ro sgrogs par byed pa
274a7: dang / sgra cher sgrogs par byed pa'o// 'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas gnod sbyin 'dis tshe 'phrogs par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis 'tshe bar byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par tho 'tshams par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin
274a8: 'dis gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis ni mi gtong bar byed do// drang srong chen po 'dis ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrungs shig/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /

274b1: dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang 'che ba med pa dang / bde ba dang legs par gnas so// drang srong chen po ni bdag cag rnams 'gro bar bgyi'o// bdag cag rnams ni bya ba mang ba dang /
274b2: byed pa mang bas so// dge slong dag bdag gis nga ni rgyal po chen po rnams la 'gro ba'i gnang ba byin no// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams langs nas bdag la phyag byas te/ bskor ba byas nas de nyid
274b3: rum sdang bar gyur to/ / dge slong dag gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang langs nas bdag la phyag byas bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// gang su dag gis bdag la bskrun gsal ste/ bstan
274b4: gsol nas snying po dang snying po med pa ji ltar zhes zhus pa de rnams de nyid du mi sdang bar 'gyur to/ / gang su dag gis bdag ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas 'dus pa byas te mi snang bar 'gyur to//
274b5: gang la la zhig gis ming dang rigs rnam par dpyad nas de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur to// gang la la zhig cang mi smra bar gyur te de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur to// dge slon/ kha don du zung ba lcang la
274b6: can gyi po brang gis bsrungs shig/ dge slong dag songs la lcar lo can po zang gis bsrungs shig/ dge slong dag don dang bcas pas lcar lo can gyi po zang gis bsrungs shig/ dge slong ngam
274b7: de su pa ga ge na pa'i dge bskyed pa rnams la bsrungs pa dang / tha ba dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / bde ba dang legs par gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
274b8: pa dang / dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// skabs rab mchog gnyis pa ste lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi pade rdzogs s+ho//

275a1: rgyag skad du/ ma hA sa ma la swA tra/ bod skang du/ 'dus pa chen po'i mdo/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shA
275a2: srab mer skya'i gzhi'i tshal chen po na dge slong ga dge 'dun chen po lda brgya ste/ de dag thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa rnams dang ldan cigatu ba zhugs so// 'ag rten gyi khams bcu'i lharnams de ma thag tu 'dus te/
275a3: gas shel dun rnams blta ba'i phyir ro// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i ris bzhi po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya'i yul snyer sgra'i gni'i rna
275a4: chen po na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po lnga brgya ste/ de thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so// 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha rnams de ma thag tu 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dag
275a5: slong gi dge 'dun rnams blta ba'i phyir ro/ / gang dag de bzhin dra bcom ldan 'das gal bad de dag song ste song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa so sor brjod par bya'o// de nas
275a6: lha de rnams kyis 'di lta ste/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa brkum pa las brkyad pa tsam brgyad pa las brkum pa de bzhin du gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams mi snang bar gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi zad du sna
275a7: bar 'gyur to/ / de nas lha de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas yang lha de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis thad du tshigs su cad
275a8: 'di rnams gsol to/ / 'dus pa chen po'i tshal 'di ru// lha yi tshogs rnams 'dus pa ste/ chos 'di'i phyir du bdag 'ongs pa// dge 'dun mi pham 'dus palta// de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis bcom ldan

275b1: 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to/ / dge 'dun sems rnams dul ba dang / rang gi sems ni drang por byas// kha lo sgyur bas drang po 'dzin// de bzhin mkhas pas dbang
275b2: po srung / / de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to// khyim gyi 'ching ba bton pa dang dbang po yi ni sems 'gro zhing // dag cing dri med der 'grob// rig
275b3: ldan glang po dul ba bzhin/ / de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to// gang zhig sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro ba// de ni ngan song 'gro mi 'gyur// mi yi lus ni
275b4: spangs nas su/ / lha yi lus ni yongs rdzogs 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rnams bos te de ma thag tu dge slong dag 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha rnams 'dus te de bzhin gshegs pa dag
275b5: slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa blta ba'i phyir ro/ / dge slong gang de rnams su 'gyur ba 'das pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams bcom ldan 'das de tsam du gyur pa de bzhin
275b6: du lha rnams 'dus par gyur to/ / 'di lta ste/ bdag kyang dge slong dag de bzhin du 'dus par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ bdag kyang 'di skad ces smras te/ dge slong dag lha'i tshogs rnams kyi ming brjod par
275b7: bya ste dge slong dag rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i lha'i tshogs dang / dge slong dag lha'i tshogs ston par byed pa zhes bya'o// de thos nas legs par yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// de ltar btsun
275b8: pa bcom ldan 'das la dge slong de rnams kyis so sor zhus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshigs su bcad pa so sor bshad// gang du sa gzhi mthong gyur na// ri yi bu ga dugang gnas pa//

276a1: de das la bar dog pa byegs gzhir seng ge 'digs med bzhin// baspu tsam yang g.yo ba med// sems ni dag cing gang ba dang // chu ni rab tu dngas bzhin du// lnga brgya ba yis legs shes shing // ser d+hA
276a2: gyi gnas mang po/ / de nas dge slong ston pas bos// bstan la dga' ba'i nyan thos rnams// lha yi tshogs rnams 'ongs nas ni// dge slong rnams kyis de shes bya// lus ni gdung par ma byed par// sangs rgyas bstan pas
276a3: pas so/ / de rnams ye shes snang bar 'gyur// mi ma yin rnams mthong byur ba// gang zhig gis ni brgya mthong zhing // stong dang bdun bcu mthong ba yin// brgya dang stod phrag ci ni/ mi ma yin rnams mthong bar 'gyur//
276a4: gang zhig gis ni mtha' med mthong // phyogs kun gang bar 'gyur ba mthong // de rnams kyis ni rtogs pa dang // spyan ldan rnam par dpyad nas ni// de phyir ston pa yi ni pos// bstan la dga' ba'i nyan thos kyis// lha'i tshigs
276a5: rnams 'ongs nas ni/ / dge slong rnams kyis de shes bya// gang zhig la ni bdag bshad bya// go rims bzhin du mnyan par gyis// stong phrag bdun gyi gnod sbyin rnams// ser skya'i sa la gnas pa ni// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang
276a6: na/ dan na thags pa ldan// sa gtum bya de 'as te/ shibs dge slong tshal drug// song zag drug gangs can gyi// gang sbyi 'dog tshogs sas/ rdzu 'phrul ldan gang 'di dang ldan/ /
276a7: dang na grags par ldan// chom gtam na b+hing 'di 'ongs te// zhi ba'i dge slong tshul na'o// sa tshogs pashes gargyan sa brgya'o// gnod sbyin kha dog tu tshogs las// rdzu 'phrul ldan gang 'ad dang ldan// kha dag dang ni zags
276a8: par ldan/ / chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te// zhi bas dge slong tshul du'o// rgyal khab gnod sbyin cha srin ni// ngos yang sa ri la gnas pa yin// stobs ldan 'bum phrag cig po na// gnod sbyin rnams kyi 'khor gyis bskor//

276b1: rgyal 'banon byin nu byin ni/ zhibs dge slong tshal du'o// shar gyi phyogs kyi rgyal po ni// mang ni yul 'khor sbyang shes bya// dri za rnams kyi bdag po ste// rgyal po chen po grags chen san/ des
276b2: bra ni mang po rnams/ / mad ni gcig tu thos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs chen po// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog dang ni grags par ldan// chos gtan bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ zha bas dge slong tshal du'o//
276b3: lho'i phyogs kyi rgyal po ni// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya// grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste// rgyal ba chen po grags chen ldan// de yi bu ni mang po rnams// ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs chen po//
276b4: rdzurdza 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog dang ni grags par ldan// chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te// zhi bas dge slong chal du'o// nub kyi phyogs kyi rgyal po ni// ming ni mig mi bzang zhes grags// klu rnams kyi na
276b5: bdag kyi ste/ / rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan// de yi bu ni mang po rnams// ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs dang ldan// kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ sa/
276b6: gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te// zhabs dge slong tshal du'o// byang gi phyogs kyi rgyal po ni/ de ming lus ngan po zhes grags// gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po ste// rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan// de yi bu ni mang po rnams//
276b7: mngan gcig tu thos pa 'i// dbang ba zhes bya stobs chen po// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog dang ni grags par ldan// chos gtam bya byir 'dir 'das te// zhabs dge slong chal du'o// shar phyogs na ni pra
276b8: 'bor skyong / / lha phyogs na ni 'phags smras pa'o// nubaphyogs nini mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ danam rgyas chen po she/ phyogs rnams pazhi po kun du'o// gzi brjid 'bar bas 'khor nas ni/

277a1: na ga tu / na na du / sa na
277a2: skye pa 'tham gyur pa dang / / ska las byung ba 'khal ga// ri nam tshigs sna da na/ sir+tham nadang / mdun dun mo ldan ldan/ me ni sa dang // dadang gzhan gyi rnam pa rnams
277a3: rgyal po dri ba dang bcas dang / / chos gat+ta ma bya bying 'drir 'das nas// zhibs dge slong tshal dul// de nas gzhan sang nams ma'i byung // sangs pacan du stan cig gnas/ yab ta mi mchog dang ni// dab 'grog
277a4: dang lhan cig pa/ / ya mun dang yul la khor skyong // klu yi sngun dang grags ldan dang // sa bsrung glang po chen po rnams// de yang nags kyi tshal du'o// gang zhig klu rgyal myur du len// lha dang bya dang nam dag ming / nam
277a5: mkha' las 'ongs tshal der sleb/ / sna tshogs 'dab bzang ces de'i ming // 'jigs med byin pas klu pi rgyal// mkha' lding bzod pa rtogs pas so// phan tshun du ni mi bi cod cing // klu blang sangs rgyas skyabs 'a
277a6: rdo rje lag gis rgyal ba dang / / rtswas mini ni rgya mchor gnas spyan rnams// de yi gnas dang ni// gzi brjid ldan zhing grags dang ldan// nag po mag sman 'jigs byed ldan// lha ma yin nams khro byed dang / zag bzang dang ni zag
277a7: bzang ris/ / mtshan 'joms na me rtsa dang bcas// stobs kyi bu ni brgyad po rnams// thams cad rnam par snang mdzad med// stobs kyi sde ni go bgos pa// sgra ba can bzang po ldan du 'gro/ btsupa de ni 'dus nas ni/
277a8: zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o// chung lhad sa dang ni/ me dang rlung yang der 'ongs so// chu lha chu yi lha dang ni// zla ba dang ni grags par ldan// byams dang snying rje'i tshogs can dang // lha ni grags ldan mdun du'o// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten

277b1: tshogs rnams ni/ / thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog dang ni grags par ldan// chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te// zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o// khyab 'jug lnga dang /
277b2: lhan cig tu// tha dad tha dad 'ongs pa dang / zla ba da yi 'khor gyi lha// zla ba'i mdun byas 'khor dang ni/ nyi ma'i 'khor gyi lha rnams dang // nyi ma'i mdun byas 'khor dang ni// d+hu skar de yi 'khor dang yang // mdun byas
277b3: pa la ha ka dang / sa dang sa yi gtso bo dang / brgya byin yang yang sbyin pa dang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs rnams dang // thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog dang ni thags
277b4: par ldan/ / chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o// de nas nyer spyod lnga dang ni// chu dang me yi rtse me bzhin// sgra ldan snang bar byed pa dang // u ma'i me tog de bzhin du// chu lha dang bcas chos dang ni/
277b5: dra nams// yang lenams pa'i mdun dang // mngan draganas dang dum dang // phyogs pa ma las tan chags dang // khams cad ladag rna chags pas// rdzu 'phrus ldan dang ldan/ 'dan
277b6: ba ts+tsha / dul / ra // / sna shA pa sa
277b7: da me dang / gang mang de nga mamigs cad da// pha la pa ma man da // rags chen 'a ga nas// rgyags rgya na/ gas dang // khams cad lad
277b8: nag na / #

278a1: yogs/ / mkhas pa'i lhan ldan du'o// ga tu grang chen mos 'breng ga 'das pa grags dang ldan pa dang // za dz+nyAn mang ba mdun du dang // gang shig phyogs ni mdzes pa dang / phyogs bca 'dzig/ rnachag
278a2: rnams dang / / thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog dang ni gags par ldan// chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te// zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o// dge ba dga'
278a3: ldan mtha' bral dang / / thags ldan shin dang ldan pa dang / 'phyang ba gnas dang gtso bo dang // 'od dang bsam pa zhes bya dang / rdzu 'phrul dga' ba sngon du dang // de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ston// phyogs
278a4: bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs dang ni/ / thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs nas// zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o// sna tshogs drug po'i sde pa ni//
278a5: thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus// ming ni grags dang ldan pa bston/ khang zhan 'dra ba lhan cig tu// ma lus rigs ni brjod pa dang // zag med tshogs ni pha rol brgal// glang chen tshogs ni blta ba dang // zla ba bzhad
278a6: pa gsum ldan dang / tshangs zad mchog gi thob pa dang // rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i bu dang ni/ de yi dga' ba'i bzhon nu ni// de rnams zhi bas tshal du'o// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong du ni// tshangs pa chen po nye bar
278a7: 'khod/ / 'od dang ldan par skyes pa dang // grags ldan sna tshogs lus dang ni// dbang blag bcu po sngon du dang // sa so dbang du 'gyur ba dang // de yi dbus dang sngon du dang / 'brog ma 'khor dang bcas pa'o//
278a8: de rnams thams cad 'ongs gyur nas// dbang po lha dang tshangs bcas 'ongs// bdud gye sde rnams 'ongs nas ni// gau ta ma thugs ni blta ba dang / 'di ni zung cig chings shig brjod/ chags pa glang po bcings pa bzhin

278b1: 'khor dang bcas pas bskor nas ni/ / gang du'ang stong pa ma yin no// de la 'di ni bde chen dang / gau ta ma sde la gnod mi nus// lag pa thal mo sdebs pa dang // 'jigs par byed pa'i tshe ngo sgrogs
278b2: ji ltar rlung gi sprin rnams dang / mun nag glog dang bcas pa ni// de ma thag tu 'jigs dang bral// bsam pa khro ba med par gnas// lha rnams thams cad dang tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas
278b3: bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur to/ / bdud kyi sde de rnams kyang cang mi smra ba'i tshul gyis song ngo // ston pas nyan thos bstan pa la dga' ba rnams bos te// de yang 'jigs pa med byed dang // dag pa'i
278b4: sangs rgyas bstan pa la/ / 'jigs med 'dod chags bral ba ni// de yi ba spu g.yo ba med// g.yul ni kun las rgyal ba dang / 'jigs pa 'das shing grags par ldan/ lha dang lhan cig brjod pa dang //
278b5: nyan thos rnams ni der gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'dus pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho//
278b6: rgya ga skad du/ me ti sAtra/ ba skad du/ byams pa'i mdo/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// ston pa dus gcig na ser sgra'i gzhi dang / n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'ang ba dang /
278b7: chu zung ro can la 'gram na bzhugs sa// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus ma 'ongs pa'i rgyal ba de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ khyed kyi rjes bstan pa tho snyan ne/ ci 'dra'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar/
278b8: spyan ldan yongs su rgyas par ni// bdag ni rab tu nyal bar 'dod// gnas brtan zhus pa gnas nas ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis leg gsungs pa// bsod nams phung po mi nyung ba'i// grags pa chen po mi pham pa'i//

279a1: ! sa dusam+b+ha/ sa sa na su ga/ khan byu // / / sa na/
279a2: cad cig/ sa sa g+sa gas sa rgyam sa// de/ sa nas dang dus lnga byung ste/ bras tha~M ba d+hA dang / nga /
279a3: kyi da/ skugang dge bar dus so// de la 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus ni/ sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ sbyod zag sa cig gi nang rtogs pa skyed par nus so// da me ni mang dus pa//
279a4: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'o// de rnams yod pa na 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus med ces brjod par mi bya'o// lhag ma na rgyun du zhugs pa ste/ de 'das nas 'bras bu'i bar gyi
279a5: nub pa zhes bya'o/ / 'di ni 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya ba yin no// sgrub pa 'bar gyi dus zhes bya ba ni/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gyi 'bras bu bslab par mi nus par/ pham pa bzhi po bsrung bar nus
279a6: pa tsam mo/ / song zhing song ba'i dus su/ pham pa bzhi po nyid bsrung ba tsam mo// pham pa bzhi po srung bar byed pa yi/ dge slong rnams stong phrag gcig gi nang na brgya tsam yod na yang sgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes
279a7: mibya'o/ / brgya'i nang na dge slong gcig tsam yod pa las sdom pa zhig pa dang / shi ba na sgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub zhes bya'o// 'di ni sgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya'o// lung gi bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya ba ni/
279a8: sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab sde snod gsum po'i don mi go zhing sgra tsam klog pa dang po te yod pa' bar ni lung gi bar gyi dus yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// song zhing song dus su rtsod pa'i dus kyi rgyal po rnams chos ma yin

279b1: bad pa / / na pa lamags panas mas ma ldan byed par gyu / dAnas 'tha dang / nams kyang gas/ da sa a la da / ASh+Ta
279b2: par me 'thebs mo/ / 'argyanams legs par bldanano// de rnams kyi 'brum smin pas deg slong ga dge 'dun la bza' bstir ma nus sa// dge slong rnams kyis khams pa rnyed pas sgrub pa dang med slob rnams 'di
279b3: minus so/ / song zhing song ba'i dus su lung gi bar gyi dus dman pa'o// dang po ni rab tu byed pa chen po nyams par 'gyur ro// de nub nas ya ma ka ma gi tshigs su bcad pa dang / kAzhi dang / gang bag dang / bdags pa
279b4: dang / sku gdung gi gtam dang / rnam 'byed dang / chos bsdu ba nub par 'gyur ba'o// chos mngon pa'i sde snod nub nas/ mdo sde'i sde snod nub par 'gyur ro// de nas aM ga phyi ma'i sde pa nub par 'gyur ro// a ga
279b5: phyi ma'i sde pa nub nas/ yang dag par ldan pa'i sde pa nub par 'gyur ro// bar ma'i sde pa dang ring po'i sde pa nub par 'gyur ro// ring po'i sde pa nub nas 'dul ba dang bcas pa'i skye rabs gnas so// 'dul ba'i sde sdod la
279b6: yang ngo dang ldan pa tsam 'dzin no/ / song zhing song ba'i dus su skyes pa'i rabs tsam yang 'dzin par mi nus so// dang po thams cad sgrol gyi skyes pa'i rabs nub par 'gyur ro// tha mar lo ma med pa'i skyes
279b7: pa'i rabs nub par 'gyur ro/ / skye rabs rnams nub nas 'dul ba'i sde sdod 'ba' shig 'dzin no// song zhing song ba'i dus su/ mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab kyi tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam dpar
279b8: byed na lung gi bar gyi dus nub pa med do/ / gang shig rgyal po chos la dad pa'i dus su glang po che'i rgyab du gser gyi zam tog gcig gzhan ste/ nor stong phrag gcig de ru btsun na sa sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i tshogs

280a1: na ga / na sa / ga na
280a2: ma ma / de dus ngas pa / na pa sa sa/ / /
280a3: 'dzin pa dang / gcer thab dge sbyong dang 'dra ba cag cad pa da // snang ba'i snod da / lag pa'i rna sol man ba'i tshul dang 'dra ba dang gi nang du bye 'grabs// sang nang ba ba'i su
280a4: gos dur smrig gis bdag la ci byed/ cung zang chos su byas pa'i dum cu lag pa'am/ 'phrin pa'am/ nAb rnams sa sas/ sgra rnams la 'gebs so// bag sa len pa dang / so nam dang / tshong lags
280a5: pabyas nas/ 'tsho ba'i phyir du spyod ci 'gro bar byed do// de'i tshe yon ster cing dge 'dun gyi ched du de thams cad ster bar byed de/ de'i tshe ngas kun dga' bo dge 'dun gyi yon gyi 'bras bu ni grangs med par bshad do//
280a6: song zhing song ba'i dus su// 'di ci bdag gi don du ngur smrig gi dum bu btogs nas dgon pa 'am nag gi tshal du sbyar bar byed do// de rnams kyi dus su rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i bar gyi dus nub par 'gyur ro// 'di ni
280a7: rtags tsa mu 'dzin pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa'i dus zhes bya ba yin no/ / de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa lo stong phrag lnga pa la rnyed pa dang bkur sti la sogs pa'i rnyeng pa chung ngo // sku gdung rnams
280a8: rnyed bkur byed pa'i gnas su 'gro bar byed do/ / seng zhing song ba'i dus su gnas thams cad du bskur sti dang sti stang mthob nas/ bstan pa tha ma'i dus su klu'i yul dang / lha'i 'jig rten dang / tshangs pa'i//

280b1: kA kA/ na / smra na / ku sa sa /
280b2: na na ma sa sa smra smra
280b3: zur to gas du bar byed do/ / sku gdung thams cad la ma'i khams langs nas de'i sku lus lhag ma med par grag par byed// 'din su gdung gi bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya ba sa no// denas po nga brag
280b4: bstan pa nub par gyur nas 'jig rten pa rnams la mi dge ba lhag par 'phel bar byed zhes bya ba'i don no/ / mi rnams la ngo tsha dang khrel med par 'gyur zhing ma dang / bu mo dang / sring mo la sogs pa'i 'du shes med par
280b5: 'gyur ro/ / phag dang ce spyang la sogs pa dang 'dra bar ngo tsha med par 'gyur ro// de nas mi dge ba la sbyor zhing tshe phrinam ci la cu yang gyur ro// lo lnga ba'i khye'i la lo lnga pa'i bu mo bag mar len no// yang lo lnga'i nang
280b6: ti du bu dang bu mo dang tsha bo dang cha mo'ang 'byung ngo / / de'i dus su mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bskal ba bar ma gsum ste/ mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma dang / nad kyi bskal pa bar ma dang / mtshon gyi
280b7: bskal pa bar ma'o/ / de la gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams la 'dod pa lhag par skyes nas/ mu ge'i bskal pa bar mar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe gti mug lhag par che ste/ nad kyi bskal pa bar ma 'gyur ro//
280b8: gang gi tshe skyon du gyur pa de'i dus su mtshon gyi bskal pa bar mar 'gyur ro// mu ge'i bskal par bar mas sems can rnams brlag par byas nas yi dgas su skye bar 'gyur ro// nad kyi bskal pa bar mas sems

281a1: sa m+b+ha sa sa / xxx/
281a2: xxx
